title: Membrii formației FiRMA revin cu un comunicat în care explică de ce i-au luat apărare lui Călin Georgescu. Muzicienii spun că au primit ameninţări "de tip fascist"
description: Membrii formaţiei FiRMA au explicat într-un comunicat de presă, la două săptămâni de când au publicat un mesaj de susţinere al fostului candidat la alegerile prezidenţiale, de ce au ales să se poziționeze ca susținători ai lui Călin Georgescu. Ca urmare a acestei atitudini, mai multe cluburi din Bucureşti şi din ţară au anulat concertele trupei programate la început de martie.
title_translated: The members of the company The company return with a statement explaining why they took Defense to Calin Georgescu. Musicians say they received "fascist -type" threats
description_translated: The members of the company have explained in a press release, two weeks since they published a message of support of the former candidate in the presidential elections, why they chose to position themselves as Calin Georgescu's supporters. As a result of this attitude, several clubs in Bucharest and in the country canceled the concerts of the band scheduled at the beginning of March.

title: Cristoiu, avertisment înfiorător: România, sub conducerea lui Bolojan, s-a alăturat unei coaliții care ar putea pune Europa pe marginea unui conflict global
description: Ion Cristoiu lansează un avertisment grav despre implicarea României în planurile Marii Britanii și ale aliaților săi. Potrivit acestuia, sub conducerea lui Ilie Bolojan, România s-a alăturat unei coaliții care ar putea pune Europa pe marginea unui conflict global, întrucât această coaliție plănuiește să trimită trupe engleze și franceze pe linia de contact cu Rusia. Analistul avertizează că o provocare bine pusă la punct ar putea duce la al Treilea Război Mondial.
title_translated: Cristoiu, infringing warning: Romania, under the leadership of Bolojan, joined a coalition that could put Europe on a global conflict
description_translated: Ion Cristoiu launches a serious warning about the involvement of Romania in the plans of Great Britain and its allies. According to him, under the leadership of Ilie Bolojan, Romania has joined a coalition that could put Europe on a global conflict, as this coalition plans to send English and French troops on the contact line with Russia. The analyst warns that a well -developed challenge could lead to World War II.

description_translated: The free telecommunications union (SL-TC) announces the negotiation and signing of the first collective labor agreement (CCM) for Microsoft Romania employees. Read more ...

title: Greșeala fatală a unei șoferițe: a dat cu spatele fără să se asigure și a ucis un bărbat de 45 de ani
description: Un accident mortal a avut loc în noaptea trecută pe drumul comunal DC54, în localitatea Drăgăneasca, comuna Ulmi, județul Giurgiu. O manevră neasigurată a dus la un deznodământ tragic, soldat cu pierderea unei vieți.
title_translated: The fatal mistake of a driver: he gave his back without securing and killed a 45 -year -old man
description_translated: A fatal accident took place last night on the communal road DC54, in the town of Draganeasca, Ulmi commune, Giurgiu county. An uninsured maneuver led to a tragic denouement, resulting in the loss of a life.

title: Cazinouri tematice: Unde poți trăi o experiență unică?

description_translated: Gambling has become amazing throughout history. Their development went hand in hand with the evolution of the society.

title: Care e povestea familiei de artişti români care a lucrat la restaurarea Catedralei Notre Dame din Paris, a Muzeului Luvru şi a Arcului de Triumf? „Dacă vă plimbaţi pe cheiul Senei, aruncaţi o privire către «Galerie du bord de l’eau». Toată sculptura nouă a fost realizată de noi"

If you are walking on the Seine Ceiului, take a look at the gallery du dash for Leau. The whole new sculpture was made by us ”
description_translated: My professional path started when I was almost 11 years old. "

description: Prima reprezentativă a Bosniei și Herțegovina a început pregătirile pentru meciul contra României (21 martie), primul din campania de calificare la Campionatul Mondial din 2026.Doar 3 zile ne despart de startul preliminariilor Campionatului Mondial din SUA, Canada și Mexic.Vineri, pe 21 martie, România va primi vizita Bosniei, un adversar mai slab cotat în clasamentul mondial al naționalelor (locul 74, față de 38 pentru „tricolori”). ...

Only 3 days we separate us from the start of the US Championship preliminaries, Canada and Mexici. 74, compared to 38 for tricolors). ... ...

title: Când va fi Liverpool campioana Angliei. Virgil van Dijk a făcut calculul
description: Căpitanul Virgil van Dijk a limitat sezonul echipei engleze de fotbal FC Liverpool la cinci victorii suplimentare și și-a avertizat coechipierii că trebuie să fie pregătiți să sufere în cursa pentru un nou titlu în Premier League, scrie DPA.
title_translated: When the champion of England will be Liverpool. Virgil Van Dijk made the calculation
description_translated: Captain Virgil Van Dijk limited the season of the English football team FC Liverpool to five additional victories and warned his teammates that they must be prepared to suffer in the race for a new title in the Premier League, writes DPA.

title: România, negocieri cu nuclearul pe masă: Se deschid noi orizonturi pentru proiecte majore cu Kazahstan
description: Colaborarea dintre România și Kazahstan ar putea atinge noi culmi, inclusiv în domeniul nuclear, după o întâlnire de rang înalt la Ministerul Energiei. Citește mai departe...

title: Crin Antonescu: Cariera mea politică de partid s-a încheiat
description: Mediafax„Sunt independent. Cariera mea politică de partid s-a încheiat”, a declarat marți Crin Antonescu, candidatul susținut de partidele din coaliția de guvernare la alegerile prezidențiale.Articolul Crin Antonescu: Cariera mea politică de partid s-a încheiat apare prima dată în Mediafax.
title_translated: Crin Antonescu: My party political career ended
description_translated: Mediafaxsunt independent. My party political career ended, said Crin Antonescu, the candidate supported by the ruling coalition in the presidential elections.

title: ANAF vinde fabrica Hexi Pharma, firmă implicată în megascandalul dezinfectaților, soldat cu moartea suspectă a lui Dan Condrea
description: ANAF a scos la vânzare fabrica Hexi Pharma, compania implicată în megascandalul dezinfectanților diluați livrați către spitale. Fiscul încearcă să vândă un teren și o hală metalică din Mogoșoaia, prețul de pornire fiind de 8 milioane de lei, potrivit datelor analizate de Profit.ro.
title_translated: ANAF sells the Hexi Pharma factory, the company involved in the disinfectants, resulting in Dan Condrea's suspicious death
description_translated: ANAF has put up for sale the Hexi Pharma factory, the company involved in the megascandal of the diluted disinfectants delivered to hospitals. The Treasury tries to sell a land and a metal hall in Mogosoaia, the starting price being 8 million lei, according to the data analyzed by Profit.ro.

title: A devenit primul arbitru transgender care conduce un meci internațional: „Este doar începutul”
description: Sapir Berman a devenit primul arbitru transgender care a condus de la centru un meci internațional.În 2021, Sapir Berman spunea „de când eram copil mă consideram fată, dar mă simțeam fată numai când eram singură. Nu am mai putut aștepta, am hotărât să-mi schimb sexul”. Între timp, a făcut operația de schimbare de sex și a continuat să arbitreze în Israel, țara natală, în meciuri de fotbal masculin. Este unul dintre cei mai apreciați „centrali” in Israel. ...
title_translated: Became the first Transgender referee leading an international match: It's just the beginning
description_translated: Sapir Berman became the first Transgender referee who led an international match from the center. In 2021, Sapir Berman said since I was a child, but I only felt the girl when I was alone. I couldn't wait, I decided to change my sex. Meanwhile, he did the sex change operation and continued to arbitrate in Israel, his native country, in male football matches. He is one of the most appreciated central in Israel. ... ...

title: Adrian Năstase: România se află într-o criză, cu efecte dramatice. Contextul internațional este extrem de periculos
description: Fostul premier și ministru de Externe, Adrian Năstase, arată faptul situația actuală din România, în care judecătorii CCR resping candidați la alegerile prezidențiale, ajunge să pună în discuție articolele din Constituție privitoare la dreptul de a alege și de a fi ales. Read more ...

title: Istoric: “Suveranismul nu este decât o diversiune. La capătul ei se află renunțarea la UE și haosul”
description: Curentul suveranist, aflat în ascensiune în România, “nu este decât o diversiune la capătul căreia se află renunțarea la proiectul european și reîntoarcerea la sistemul haotic al statelor naționale”, a declarat, într-un interviu pentru știrileprotv.ro, istoricul Cosmin Popa.
title_translated: History: Sovereignism is only a diversion. At her end is the quitting of the EU and chaos
description_translated: The sovereignist current, in Romania, is only a diversion at the end of which is the renunciation of the European project and the return to the chaotic system of the national states, said, in an interview for newsprotv.ro, the historian Cosmin Popa.

title: Salarii versus inflaţie la început de 2025: creşterile salariale depăşesc inflaţia, dar cât de mult contează în buzunarul românilor?
description: Câştigul salarial mediu net a fost de 5.328 lei, în scădere cu 317 lei (-5,6%) faţă de luna decembrie 2024 şi în creştere cu 9,7% faţă de ianuarie 2024, arată datele de la Institutul Naţional de Statistică (INS).
title_translated: Salaries versus inflation at the beginning of 2025: The wage increases exceed the inflation, but how much does it matter in the pocket of the Romans?
description_translated: The average net salary was 5,328 lei, decreasing with 317 lei (-5.6%) compared to December 2024 and up 9.7% compared to January 2024, data from the National Institute of Statistics (INS) shows.

title: Putin cere suspendarea livrărilor de arme către Ucraina în timpul armistițiului propus de Trump (Bloomberg)
description: Președintele rus Vladimir Putin cere suspendarea tuturor livrărilor de arme către Ucraina în timpul armistițiului propus de omologul său american Donald Trump, potrivit unor persoane familiarizate cu subiectul, citate de Bloomberg.
title_translated: Putin requires the suspension of weapons to Ukraine during Trump's proposed armistice (Bloomberg)
description_translated: Russian President Vladimir Putin requests the suspension of all weapons to Ukraine during the armistice proposed by his American counterpart Donald Trump, according to people familiar with the subject, quoted by Bloomberg.

Aceasta precizează că România și Europa nu se pot dezvolta doar din declarații. Citește mai departe...

title: Dezvăluiri din interiorul Kremlinului: Putin nu vrea pace, are un plan dublu pentru Trump, care e derutat
description: Există, în sfârșit, un progres în eforturile de a pune capăt războiului din Ucraina. După săptămâni de represalii sinuoase, încapsulate în acea scenă notorie din Biroul Oval, Statele Unite și Ucraina au convenit săptămâna trecută asupra unei încetări a focului de 30 de zile. Dar, potrivit unor surse din interiorul Kremlinului, Vladimir Putin nu vrea pace, el are un plan dublu cu Trump, care este derutat de tactica fostului spion KGB.
title_translated: Disclosures inside the Kremlin: Putin does not want peace, has a double plane for Trump, which is confused
description_translated: There is, finally, progress in the efforts to end the Ukraine war. After weeks of sinuous reprisals, encapsulated in that notorious scene in the Oval Office, the United States and Ukraine agreed last week on a 30 -day fire. But, according to sources inside the Kremlin, Vladimir Putin does not want peace, he has a double plane with Trump, which is confused by the tactics of the former KGB spy.

title: Produsele auto reduse până la 20% pe care șoferii români le pot cumpăra de la Carrefour
description: Carrefour România lansează o campanie de reduceri semnificative la o gamă largă de produse. Retailerul oferă prețuri mai mici atât la produsele auto, cât și la cele esențiale pentru gospodărie, potrivit catalogului de oferte. Reduceri la produsele auto din Carrefour Reducerile la produsele auto includ anvelope de vară și uleiuri de motor. De exemplu, anvelopele [...]
title_translated: Reduced car products up to 20% that Romanian drivers can buy from Carrefour
description_translated: Carrefour Romania launches a campaign of significant discounts on a wide range of products. The retailer offers lower prices for both car and essential products for the household, according to the offer catalog. Discounts on car products Carrefour discounts on car products include summer tires and engine oils. For example, tires [...]

title: Nicușor Dan vrea la Cotroceni, dar ține la secret finanțatorii campaniei sale
description: Nicușor Dan ține cu dinții la cursa prezidențială și la sertar lista oamenilor care-i finanțează campania. Edilul Capitalei a susținut de multe ori în declarații că oamenii care donează sunt cetățeni români și a făcut apel la posibili donatori să i se alăture. Sumele primite în campania pentru alegerile locale au fost trecute în declarația de avere, dar numele donatorilor au fost ascunse. Între timp, Nicușor Dan continuă campania după ce și-a delegat atribuțiile, dar încasează salariul. Jurnaliștii Realitatea PLUS au cerut un punct de vedere în privința listei cu donatori.
title_translated: Nicusor Dan wants to Cotroceni, but secretly holds the financiers of his campaign
description_translated: Nicusor Dan holds his teeth at the presidential race and in the drawer the list of people who finance his campaign. The mayor of the capital has often argued in statements that people who donate are Romanian citizens and called on possible donors to join them. The amounts received in the campaign for the local elections were passed in the declaration of wealth, but the names of the donors were hidden. Meanwhile, Nicusor Dan continued the campaign after delegating his duties, but collects the salary. The journalists Realitatea Plus have asked for a point of view regarding the list with donors.

title_translated: A FIFA report highlights the inequities in women's football
description_translated: Mediafaxun FIFA report shows that female football remains underfinite, with low salaries and insufficient income for teams, despite increasing global attention on this sport, writes AP. A article FIFA highlights inequities in women's football appears in Mediafax.

The announcement was made by George Marius Caranica, the executive director of the Cooperation and Local Partnership Association for the development of the Lacu Sarat resort. He hoped that [...]

title: China încurajează natalitatea cu lapte gratuit şi subvenţii pentru îngrijirea copiilor
description: MediafaxOraşul Hohhot din China, capitala Mongoliei Interioare, a anunţat o serie de subvenţii pentru îngrijirea copiilor şi a promis să „aibă grijă” de proaspetele mame oferindu-le zilnic, gratuit, o cană cu lapte, relatează Reuters.Articolul China încurajează natalitatea cu lapte gratuit şi subvenţii pentru îngrijirea copiilor apare prima dată în Mediafax.
title_translated: China encourages free milk birth and subsidies for children's care
description_translated: Mediafaxoras Hohhot in China, the capital of the inner Mongolia, announced a series of subsidies for children's care and promised to take care of the new mothers by offering them daily, for free, a cup of milk, reports Reuters. The article China encourages the birth rate and subsidies for children's care appears in Mediafax.

title: Crizele reduc bugetele, dar nu distrug vacanţele. Turiştii români şi-au făcut deja planurile de vacanţă pentru această vară, rezervările au început să apară din toamna trecută, iar unele chartere sunt pe jumătate pline
description: În perioadele de incertitudine politică, economică sau socială, oamenii au tendinţa de a reduce din chel­tuielile care nu sunt de strictă necesitate, însă vacanţele au devenit un necesar chiar şi în aceste vremuri. Cu toate că traversăm un context local şi global plin de provocări, cererea pentru vacanţe este bună şi există un trend ascendent faţă de anul anterior.
title_translated: Crisis reduce budgets, but do not destroy holidays. The Romanian tourists have already made their holiday plans for this summer, the reservations have begun to appear last fall, and some charters are half full
description_translated: In periods of political, economic or social uncertainty, people tend to reduce the expenses that are not of strict necessity, but vacations have become a need even in these times. Although we cross a local and global context full of challenges, the demand for vacations is good and there is an upward trend compared to the previous year.

title: Cel mai înalt munte de gunoi din lume: „Mirosul e insuportabil!”
description: Muntele de Gunoi din Delhi, India, acoperă o suprafață de aproximativ 700.000 de metri pătrați (echivalentul a peste 50 de terenuri de fotbal) și este aproape la fel de înalt ca faimosul Taj Mahal (73 m). Creată în 1984, la periferia zonei Ghazipur, groapa de gunoi a atins capacitatea maximă în 2002
title_translated: The highest mountain of garbage in the world: the smell is unbearable!
description_translated: The garbage mountain in Delhi, India, covers an area of ​​about 700,000 square meters (the equivalent of over 50 football fields) and is almost as high as the famous Taj Mahal (73 m). Created in 1984, on the outskirts of the Ghazipur area, the trash pit has reached the maximum capacity in 2002

title: Vladimir Putin, avertisment înainte de discuția cu Donald Trump. Ținta liderului de la Kremlin
description: Companiile occidentale care „au trântit uşa sfidător” atunci când au părăsit Rusia nu vor avea voie să-şi răscumpere afacerile vândute pe sume mici sau să ocupe nişe pe care le-au luat deja companiile locale, a declarat Vladimir Putin.
title_translated: Vladimir Putin, warning before discussing with Donald Trump. The target of the Kremlin leader
description_translated: Western companies that have treated the defiant door when they left Russia will not be allowed to redeem their business on small amounts or to occupy niches that local companies have already taken, Vladimir Putin said.

title: Elevii de clasa a VIII-a au dat simularea la matematică. Profesor: „Se obține ușor o notă de trecere (...)!"
description: Astăzi, elevii claselor a VIII-a, din întreaga țară, au susținut proba scrisă la matematică, în cadrul simulării Evaluării Naționale 2025. Profesorul Cătălin Ciupală a comentat subiectele în exclusivitate pentru Click!.

description_translated: Today, the students of the eighth grade, from all over the country, have supported the written test in mathematics, during the simulation of the national evaluation 2025. Professor Catalin Ciupala commented the topics exclusively for Click!.

title: Sumă gigantică pentru infrastructura şi apărarea Germaniei

În favoarea proiectului au votat partidele conservatoare, Uniunea Creştin-Democrată, Creştin-Socială, bavareză, Partidul Social-Democrat şi cel Ecologist. Intervenind la Curtea Constituţională, opoziţia, formată din partidul naţionalist-autoritar, Alternativa pentru Germania (AfD) şi din Uniunea Sahra Wagenknecht (BSW), a încercat, fără succes, să stopeze votul.

In favor of the project, the conservative parties, the Christian-Democratic, Christian-Social, Bavarian, the Social-Democratic and Ecological Party voted. Intervening at the Constitutional Court, the opposition, consisting of the Nationalist-Authority Party, an alternative to Germany (AFD) and from the Sahra Wagenknecht (BSW) Union, tried, without success, to stop the vote.

title: Zbor de 8 ore către nicăieri. 120 de pasageri s-au întors acasă după două încercări ratate de aterizare, în două țări
description: Un avion Eurowings care a decolat din Germania nu a putut ateriza în Norvegia din cauza vântului puternic. Aeronava Airbus A320 a fost deviată spre Finlanda, în speranța că vremea se va calma. Dar vântul s-a întețit, așa că cei 120 de pasageri au ajuns înapoi la Düsseldorf, după 8 ore, relatează Business Insider.
title_translated: 8 -hour flight to nowhere. 120 passengers returned home after two missed landing attempts, in two countries
description_translated: A Eurowings aircraft that took off from Germany could not land in Norway because of the strong wind. The Airbus A320 aircraft was diverted to Finland, hoping that the weather will calm down. But the wind was intended, so the 120 passengers arrived back in Dusseldorf, after 8 hours, reports Business Insider.

description_translated: Germany and Italy drew, score 3-3, in the return of the quarters of the League of Nations. Due to the victory in the tour, with 2-1, the Germans qualified in the semifinals. The semifinals of the League of Nations will take place on June 4 and 5, 2025. The big and small final will be disputed on June 8, 2025. The semifinals and finals of the League of Nations will be played in the final-Four system, even in Germany. ... ...

title: AGA extraordinară la UniCredit să aprobe fuziunea cu Alpha şi majorarea capitalului cu 135 milioane lei, la 590 milioane lei
description: UniCredit Bank România, controlată de grupul ita­lian cu acelaşi nume, a avut ieri adunarea generală extraordinară a acţionarilor pentru aprobarea proiectului de fuziune prin absorbţie cu Alpha Bank România (societate absorbită).
title_translated: Extraordinary Aga at UniCredit to approve the merger with Alpha and capital increase by 135 million lei, to 590 million lei
description_translated: UniCredit Bank Romania, controlled by the Italian group with the same name, had yesterday the extraordinary general meeting of shareholders for the approval of the merger project with absorption with Alpha Bank Romania (absorbed company).

title: Magazinele au devenit oglinda consumatorului: pentru unii clienţi contează banii, pentru alţii timpul. În acest context, canelele de discount, proximitate modernă şi online sunt cele care câştigă teren în România
description: Cel mai important canal de vâzare din România este astăzi cel de discount, care a ajuns la final de 2024 la o cotă de piaţă de 27,7% după creşteri succesive an de an.
title_translated: The shops have become the consumer mirror: for some customers the money matters, for others time. In this context, the discounts, modern and online proximity are those that win land in Romania
description_translated: The most important vazing channel in Romania is today the discount, which has reached the end of 2024 at a market share of 27.7% after successive increases year by year.

title: Bursă. Cum se tranzacţionează acţiunile celor două bănci de la Bursa de Valori Bucureşti comparativ cu alte bănci din regiune
description: Casa de brokeraj BRK Financial Group consideră că, pe baza re­zultatelor esti­mative pentru anul 2025, acţiunile Băncii Transilvania (TLV) se tranzacţionează la un raport între capitalizare şi profitul net (multiplu P/E) de 6,5 ori, în linie cu me­diana de 6,9x şi sub media de 8,1x date de 17 acţiuni bancare listate pe burse din România, Austria, Grecia, Cehia, Polonia, Turcia, Ungaria, Croaţia şi Slovacia.
title_translated: Stock Exchange. How the actions of the two banks from the Bucharest Stock Exchange compared to other banks in the region are traded
description_translated: The Brk Financial Group brokerage house considers that, based on the estimated results for 2025, the actions of the Transilvania Bank (TLV) are traded to a report between capitalization and net profit (multiple P/E), 6.5 times, in line with the 6.9x median and below 8.1x data of 17 bank actions listed on stock exchanges, Austria, Austria, Greece Poland, Turkey, Hungary, Croatia and Slovakia.

title: Grupul hotelier Marriott plănuieşte să deschidă şapte hoteluri în următorii ani în Timişoara, Sibiu, Cluj-Napoca, Braşov, Călimăneşti şi Arad
description: Lanţul hotelier internaţional Marriott îşi va extinde portofoliul local cu încă şapte hoteluri în următorii ani, în oraşele Timişoara, Sibiu, Cluj-Napoca, Braşov, Călimăneşti şi Arad.
title_translated: The Marriott hotel group plans to open seven hotels in the coming years in Timisoara, Sibiu, Cluj-Napoca, Brasov, Calimanesti and Arad
description_translated: The International Marriott hotel chain will expand its local portfolio with seven hotels in the coming years, in Timisoara, Sibiu, Cluj-Napoca, Brasov, Calimanesti and Arad.

title: Reportaje industriale. Din Bistriţa pentru România şi mai departe: cum pregăteşte Electroplast industria cablurilor electrice pentru viitor
description: Zgomotul constant al maşi­ni­lor de producţie, mirosul me­ta­lului prelucrat şi ritmul a­lert al muncitorilor contu­rea­ză o ima­gine a unei industrii în pli­nă mişcare în interiorul fabricii Electroplast din judeţul Bistriţa-Năsăud. În halele de producţie, cablurile nu reprezintă un simplu produs care va pleca în scurt timp către cum­părători, ci o verigă esenţială în marile pro­iecte de infrastructură ale României.
title_translated: Industrial reports. From Bistrita for Romania and further: how Electroplast Electric Cable Industry is preparing for the future
description_translated: The constant noise of the production machines, the smell of the processed metal and the alert rhythm of the workers outline an image of an industry in full move inside the Electroplast factory in Bistrita-Nasaud county. In the production halls, the cables are not a simple product that will shortly leave for buyers, but an essential link in the big infrastructure projects of Romania.

title: Secretele antreprenorului de succes - SAS 2025: „IMM-uri româneşti pe harta lumii: O Misiune IMMposibilă?“ De la local la global: IMM-urile româneşti trebuie să îndrăznească să facă pasul pe pieţe externe. Avem produse şi servicii bune, trebuie să avem curaj să ieşim pe plan internaţional
description: Într-o economie globalizată, unde graniţele devin tot mai permeabile pentru afaceri, IMM-urile româneşti au ocazia de a-şi extinde operaţiunile dincolo de piaţa locală. Antreprenorii români trebuie să aibă curajul de a face pasul spre pieţele externe, bazându-se pe produsele şi serviciile pe care le oferă, a fost concluzia principală a evenimentului Secretele antreprenorului de succes - SAS 2025.
title_translated: The secrets of the successful entrepreneur - SAS 2025: Romanian SMEs on the world map: an immovable mission? From the local to the global: Romanian SMEs must dare to step on foreign markets. We have good products and services, we must have the courage to exit internationally
description_translated: In a globalized economy, where the borders become increasingly permeable for business, Romanian SMEs have the opportunity to expand their operations beyond the local market. The Romanian entrepreneurs must have the courage to take the step towards the external markets, based on the products and services they offer, it was the main conclusion of the event the secrets of the successful entrepreneur - SAS 2025.

title: „Singura cale de comunicare reală cu administraţia republicană a SUA este prin subsemnatul”: George Simion, după ce includerea României în programul Visa Waiver a fost suspendată
description: Președintele AUR, George Simion, a reacționat marți seară la anunțul autorităților americane privind amânarea includerii României în programul Visa Waiver, acuzând Guvernul condus de Marcel Ciolacu de incompetență și corupție și afirmând că este principalul...

title: Animalul care se recunoaște în oglindă. Mai mult, are abilitatea unică de a reține foarte ușor fețele oamenilor
description: Aceste păsări sunt printre cele mai comune din întreaga lume, iar cei mai mulți dintre noi le vedem aproape zilnic. Însă, deși trăiesc atât de aproape de oameni, doar puțini dintre noi știu cât de inteligente, sunt, de fapt, aceste păsări!
title_translated: The animal that is recognized in the mirror. Moreover, it has the unique ability to easily retain people's girls
description_translated: These birds are among the most common in the world, and most of us see them almost daily. But although they live so close to people, only few of us know how smart, these birds are actually!

title: Trump îl critică pe George Clooney: E un star de cinema de mâna a doua și un expert politic ratat
description: Donald Trump l-a criticat pe actorul George Clooney, un activist democrat proeminent, după ce acesta a abordat teme politice în cadrul unei emisiuni. Președintele american l-a descris pe actorul premiat cu Oscar drept „un «star» de cinema de mâna a doua și un expert politic ratat”.
title_translated: Trump criticized George Clooney: It's a second -hand cinema star and a missed political expert
description_translated: Donald Trump criticized actor George Clooney, a prominent democratic activist, after he addressed political themes in a show. The US president described the Academy Actor with Oscar as a second-hand cinema star and a missed political expert.

title: Ministrul Apărării s-a întâlnit cu șeful NATO. Ce au discutat Angel Tîlvăr și Mark Rutte
description: Asumarea unui rol mai activ al Europei în apărarea proprie reprezintă răspunsul necesar la provocările actuale, a afirmat, marţi, ministrul Apărării Naţionale, Angel Tîlvăr, la întrevederea cu secretarul general al NATO, Mark Rutte, transmite Agerpres.
title_translated: The Minister of Defense met with the head of NATO. What did Angel Tilvar and Mark Rutte discuss
description_translated: Assuming a more active role of Europe in its own defense represents the necessary response to the current challenges, said National Defense Minister Angel Tilvar on Tuesday, meeting with NATO Secretary General, Mark Rutte, Agerpres reports.

title: Femeie cu handicap sever după implanturi mamare cu ADN de bovine. Clinica ”oferea” și urme de cămilă, lilieci și gorile
description: O femeie din China care a cheltuit sute de mii de dolari pentru implanturi mamare a rămas cu handicap sever după ce clinica a folosit materiale cu ADN bovin. Investigațiile au descoperit ulterior și implanturi cu ADN de cămilă, lilieci și gorilă.
title_translated: Woman with severe handicap after mammary implants with cattle DNA. The clinic also offered traces of camel, bats and gorillas
description_translated: A woman from China who spent hundreds of thousands of dollars for breast implants remained with severe handicap after the clinic used bovin DNA materials. The investigations later discovered implants with Camila, bats and gorilla.

title: Ucraina și Rusia, acord de încetare a focului în Marea Neagră
description: Statele Unite și Ucraina au convenit să asigure siguranța navigației, să elimine utilizarea forței și să prevină utilizarea navelor comerciale în scopuri militare în Marea Neagră, anunță marți Casa Albă într-un comunicat oficial.
title_translated: Ukraine and Russia, an agreement to cease fire in the Black Sea
description_translated: The United States and Ukraine have agreed to ensure the safety of navigation, eliminate the use of force and prevent the use of commercial vessels for military purposes in the Black Sea, the White House announces in an official statement.

title: Rusia a prezentat lista de obiective pe care susține că nu le va ataca, în Ucraina, în timpul armistițiului de 30 de zile
description: Kremlinul a prezentat marți seară, într-un comunicat publicat pe Telegram, lista infrastructurilor energetice pe care armata rusă nu le va ataca într-un „moratoriu” de 30 de zile - care a început la 18 martie, relatează AFP, potrivit News.ro.
title_translated: Russia presented the list of goals that he claims will not attack, in Ukraine, during the 30 -day armistice
description_translated: The Kremlin presented on Tuesday evening, in a statement published on Telegram, the list of energy infrastructures that the Russian army will not attack in a 30-day "mill"-which started on March 18, reports AFP, according to news.ro.

title: Instagram lansează o nouă funcţie care le permite profesorilor să sesizeze hărţuirea
description: MediafaxInstagram îşi intensifică lupta împotriva bullying-ului printr-un nou instrument, care implică direct oficialii din şcoli pentru a accelera răspunsul la problemele care îi afectează pe adolescenţi. Este vorba de un „Program de Parteneriate cu Şcolile”, informează Engadget.Articolul Instagram lansează o nouă funcţie care le permite profesorilor să sesizeze hărţuirea apare prima dată în Mediafax.
title_translated: Instagram launches a new function that allows teachers to notice harassment
description_translated: Mediafaxinstagram intensifies their fight against bullying through a new tool, which directly involves school officials to accelerate the response to problems that affect teenagers. This is a "school partnership program", informs Engadget. The Instagram article launches a new function that allows teachers to notice harassment appears in Mediafax.

title: Federația Internațională de Atletism aprobă testul bucal pentru verificarea sexului biologic al atleților
description: Federaţia Internaţională de Atletism a anunţat, marţi, că a aprobat introducerea unui test cu tamponul bucal pentru a determina dacă un atlet este biologic de sex feminin, conform news.ro. Citește mai departe...
title_translated: The International Athletics Federation approves the oral test to verify the biological sex of athletes
description_translated: The International Athletics Federation announced on Tuesday that it has approved the introduction of a test with the buccal pad to determine if an athlete is female biological, according to news.ro. Read on ...

title: Măsurile cu care amenință Trump pot lovi Europa din plin. România și țările ca ea sunt expuse pierderilor
description: Președintele american, Donald Trump, ar urma să anunțe pe 2 aprilie un val de taxe pe importurile care provin, printre altele, din Uniunea Europeană, vorbind chiar de o „zi a eliberării”. Similar cu alte astfel de măsuri anunțate până acum, este neclar chiar și cu aproximativ o săptămână înainte de această dată ce sectoare vor fi afectate exact, Oricum, impactul ar putea fi semnificativ pe economia blocului comunitar, avertizează bancherii europeni.
title_translated: The measures with which Trump threatens can hit Europe fully. Romania and the countries like it are exposed to losses
description_translated: US President Donald Trump would announce on April 2 a wave of taxes on imports that come, among others, from the European Union, talking about a "day of liberation". Similar to other such measures announced so far, it is unclear even about a week before this time that sectors will be affected exactly, anyway, the impact could be significant on the economy of the Community Bloc, warns European bankers.

title: Daniel Pancu i-a certat pe jucătorii din atac, după România - Olanda: „Asta o poate face și mamaie”

title: Daniel Pancu, după România U21 - Olanda U21 0-2: „Nu s-a urmărit rezultatul nici azi, nici în meciul trecut, dar sunt supărat că facem greșeli în atac”
title_translated: Daniel Pancu, after Romania U21-Holland U21 0-2: "The result was not followed today, nor in the last match, but I am upset that we make mistakes in attack"

title: Constantin Grameni, după eșecul de pe „Arcul de Triumf”: „Suntem puțin dezamăgiți, nu supărați, am întâlnit două forțe ale Europei”
title_translated: Constantin Grameni, after the failure on the "Arc de Triomphe": "We are a little disappointed, not upset, we met two forces of Europe"

title: General care a comandat trupele americane în Europa, previziune sumbră. Dacă Ucraina cade, Rusia va bate la ușa României în câțiva ani, poate mai devreme
description: Generalul (r) Ben Hodges, fostul comandant al trupelor americane din Europa, a făcut un pronostic pesimist în scenariul în care Federația Rusă ar avea câștig de cauză în războiul din Ucraina. Într-o asemenea situație, Rusia "va bate la ușa României", în câțiva ani, dacă nu chiar mai devreme, a declarat ofițerul de rang înalt, la un post TV.
title_translated: General who ordered American troops in Europe, gloomy forecast. If Ukraine falls, Russia will knock on the Romanian door in a few years, maybe earlier
description_translated: General (R) Ben Hodges, the former commander of American troops in Europe, has made a pessimistic prognosis in the scenario in which the Russian Federation would win in the Ukraine War. In such a situation, Russia "will knock on the Romanian door", in a few years, if not earlier, said the high-ranking officer, at a TV station.

title: Cătălin Cîrjan, după România U21 - Olanda U21 0-2: „Important e să luăm lucrurile pozitive, ne-am creat ocazii de a marca”
title_translated: Cătălin Cîrjan, after Romania U21-Holland U21 0-2: "It is important to take the positive things, we created opportunities to mark"

description_translated: Ukrainian President Volodimir Zelenski said on Tuesday that his country intends to "implement" the agreements announced by the White House in particular an armistice in the Black Sea between Kiev and Moscow, qualifying them as "good measures", according to Read more ...

title: Ce le-au cerut rușii americanilor la masa negocierilor. Zelenski a tunat imediat după încheierea discuțiilor de la Riad
description: Președintele ucrainean Volodimir Zelenski e sceptic după negocierile purtate de SUA cu Rusia la Riad. Iată care au fost cerințele Moscovei la masa discuțiilor.

title: YouTube testează o nouă funcție care va fi pe placul utilizatorilor. Ce se întâmplă cu videoclipurile recomandate
description: Google experimentează cu o funcție YouTube care ar putea schimba modul în care descoperim conținut nou pe platformă. Este vorba despre o listă de recomandări video care apare în timpul redării, fără să fie nevoie să întrerupi ceea ce urmărești deja. Inițiativa este testată momentan doar de utilizatorii YouTube Premium și are un obiectiv clar: creșterea timpului petrecut în aplicație.
title_translated: YouTube tests a new feature that will like users. What happens to the recommended videos
description_translated: Google experiences with a Youtube function that could change how we discover new content on the platform. This is a list of video recommendations that appear during the play, without having to interrupt what you are already watching. The initiative is currently tested only by YouTube premium users and has a clear goal: increasing the time spent in the application.

title: A murit scriitoarea și jurnalista Doina Jela, la vârsta de 74 de ani
description: MediafaxScriitoarea, jurnalista și traducătoarea Doina Jela s-a stins din viață la vârsta de 74 de ani, a transmis miercuri, Radio România Cultural.Articolul A murit scriitoarea și jurnalista Doina Jela, la vârsta de 74 de ani apare prima dată în Mediafax.
title_translated: The writer and journalist Doina Jela died at the age of 74
description_translated: MediafaxSCrieriator, journalist and translator Doina Jela died at the age of 74, said Radio Romania Cultural. The article died the writer and journalist Doina Jela, at the age of 74 first appears in Mediafax.

title: Filiera rusă Vucic - Ponta - Ghiță. Dezvăluiri fără precedent: Omul consiliat de Ponta, șeful mafiei din Serbia
description: Victor Ponta și Sebastian Ghiță sunt prinși în caracatița mafiei puse la punct la Belgrad de Aleksandar Vucic. Jurnaliștii de la New York Times au deslușit mafia sârbo-rusească condusă de președintele de la Belgrad cu ajutorul serviciilor secrete. Sebastian Ghiță s-a refugiat în Serbia în 2016, după ce a fost acuzat de parchetele din România de Corupție. Fostul politician a fugit din țară, după ce Victor Ponta a pierdut alegerile prezidențiale.
title_translated: The Russian Vucic - Ponta - Ghiță. Unprecedented disclosures: the man advised by Ponta, the head of the mafia in Serbia
description_translated: Victor Ponta and Sebastian Ghiță are trapped in the mafia's octopus in Belgrade by Aleksandar Vucic. The journalists from the New York Times have discharged the Serbian-Russian mafia led by the Belgrade president with the help of secret services. Sebastian Ghiță took refuge in Serbia in 2016, after being accused of corruption Romania prosecutors. The former politician fled the country, after Victor Ponta lost the presidential elections.

title: Reforme amânate, de care atârnă 2 miliarde de euro. Numirile în companiile de stat și contractele la căi ferate, arătate cu degetul de la Bruxelles
description: Comisia Europeană a sancționat marți, 25 martie, România pentru neîndeplinirea unor obiective menționate în Planul Național de Redresare și Reziliență. Deși principala problemă ține de tema cunoscută a pensiilor speciale, instituția a punctat și progresul insuficient pe obiective de transport și pe numirea șefilor din companiile de stat.
title_translated: Delayed reforms, which hang 2 billion euros. Appointments in State Companies and Railway Contracts, shown with your finger at Brussels
description_translated: The European Commission sanctioned on Tuesday, March 25, Romania for failure to meet some objectives mentioned in the National Plan of Redress and Resility. Although the main problem is related to the known theme of special pensions, the institution also pointed out insufficient progress on transport objectives and appointment of heads of state -owned companies.

title: Ponta nu ar accepta niciodată ca Ministerul Finanțelor să fie condus de un reprezentant UDMR
description: Victor Ponta a făcut miercuri o serie de declarații critice la adresa influenței Ungariei în politica românească, afirmând că nu îi place faptul că premierul ungar Viktor Orban „e mult prea puternic în România".
title_translated: Ponta would never accept that the Ministry of Finance be driven by an UDMR representative
description_translated: Victor Ponta made a series of critical statements on the influence of Hungary in Romanian politics, saying that he does not like the fact that Hungarian Prime Minister Orban "is far too powerful in Romania".

title: Imagine de colecție cu două LEGENDE ale atletismului românesc
description: Două legende ale atletismului românesc au apărut într-o imagine de colecție, la inițiativa realizatoarei TV Marina Almășan. Este vorba despre Doina Melinte și Violeta Beclea-Szekely, iar motivul publicării fotografiei a fost acela că Violeta Beclea a aniversat azi o vârstă frumoasă.

description_translated: Two legends of Romanian athletics appeared in a collection image, at the initiative of TV Marina Almășan. It is about Doina Melinte and Violeta Becle-Szekely, and the reason for publishing the photo was that Violeta Beclea celebrated a beautiful age today.

title: Marcel Ciolacu: Eu îmi doresc impozitare progresivă. România îşi poate permite, în următorii cinci ani, să rămână la cota unică
description: Premierul Marcel Ciolacu este în continuare susţinătorul impozitului progresiv, dar spune că ”România îşi poate permite, în următorii cinci ani, să rămână la cota unică”. El vrea o discuţie în urma căreia să se renunţe...

description_translated: Prime Minister Marcel Ciolacu is still the supporter of the progressive tax, but says that "Romania can afford, within the next five years, to remain at the single share." He wants a discussion after which to give up ...

title: China interzice camerele de recunoaștere facială în băile publice, dar le permite pentru o situație destul de îngrijorătoare. Ce se ascunde în spatele noilor reguli?
description: China pare că pune frână tehnologiei de supraveghere, dar păstrează în același timp un drum liber pentru folosirea ei în scopuri pe care puțini le pot controla. Autoritățile de la Beijing au introdus recent un set de reguli stricte care limitează utilizarea sistemelor de recunoaștere facială în spațiile publice, însă noile legi vin cu o excepție notabilă, care ridică semne de întrebare.
title_translated: China forbids facial recognition rooms in public baths, but allows them for a fairly worrying situation. What is hiding behind the new rules?
description_translated: China seems to put the brake on surveillance technology, but keeps a free way for its use for the purposes that few can control. The Beijing authorities have recently introduced a set of strict rules that limit the use of facial recognition systems in public spaces, but the new laws come with a notable exception, which raises question marks.

title: FOTO Mister geologic pe Marte: Oamenii de știință, uimiți, caută să descifreze ce ascund sferele stranii găsite de Roverul Perseverance
description: Roverul Perseverance al NASA a dat peste o rocă neobișnuită, cu aspect „plutitor”, a cărei suprafață este presărată cu mici sfere. Unele dintre acestea sunt neregulate și prezintă mici perforații la vârf. Citește mai departe...
title_translated: Photo geological mystery on Mars: scientists, amazed, seek to decipher what they hide the strange spheres found by the Perseverance Rover
description_translated: The Perseverance Rover of NASA has overcame an unusual rock, with a "floating" appearance, whose surface is sprinkled with small spheres. Some of these are irregular and have small perforations at the top. Read on ...

title: Trump impune noi taxe vamale: Măsurile sale economice vor schimba comerțul global
description: Preşedintele american Donald Trump va anunţa miercuri taxe vamale care vor aplicate asupra produselor industriei auto importate în SUA, a anunţat purtătoarea de cuvânt a Casei Albe, Karoline Leavitt, potrivit AFP şi Reuters, citat de Agerpres. Citește mai departe...

title: Preţurile petrolului au crescut miercuri cu 1%, pe fondul scăderii stocurilor din SUA şi al temerilor legate de livrările din Venezuela
description: Preţurile petrolului au crescut miercuri, susţinute de datele guvernamentale care arată scăderi semnificative ale stocurilor de ţiţei şi carburanţi în SUA, precum şi de îngrijorările privind o posibilă reducere a ofertei globale, în contextul ameninţărilor cu tarife impuse de Citește mai departe...
title_translated: Oil prices increased by 1%Wednesday, against the background of decreased stocks in the US and fears about deliveries in Venezuela
description_translated: Oil prices increased Wednesday, supported by governmental data that show significant decreases in oil and fuel stocks in the US, as well as concerns about a possible reduction in global offer, in the context of threats with imposed rates.

description_translated: Jair Bolsonaro is to be tried on a coup attempt against his rival Luiz Incio Lula Da Silva, on Wednesday established the Supreme Court of Brazil by a historical decision, exposing the former president to a heavy prison sentence and read further ...

title: Kremlinul joacă tare - Care este condiția ca armistițiul maritim să intre în vigoare

description_translated: Russia announces on Wednesday that some Western sanctions against the Kremlin should be lifted before the Fire Agreement at the Black Sea, approved on Tuesday, enter into force, notes Mediafax. Read on ...

title: Locul de vis din Europa extrem de ieftin și puțin cunoscut românilor: „E altceva!”
description: Când vine vorba de vacanțe estivale, majoritatea românilor aleg destinații consacrate precum Grecia, Turcia sau Bulgaria. Totuși, pentru cei care doresc ceva nou, mai puțin aglomerat și, mai ales, accesibil ca preț, Polonia devine o opțiune din ce în ce mai atractivă.
title_translated: The dream place in Europe extremely cheap and little known to the Romanians: "It's something else!"
description_translated: When it comes to summer holidays, most Romanians choose consecrated destinations such as Greece, Turkey or Bulgaria. However, for those who want something new, less crowded and, especially, accessible, Poland becomes an increasingly attractive option.

title: 12 lucruri pe care un terapeut specializat în traume din copilărie îi „imploră” pe părinți să înceteze imediat să le facă
description: Atunci când părinții adoptă anumite comportamente dăunătoare, își pregătesc copiii pentru eșec în viața de adult. Un terapeut a realizat o listă cu lucruri pe care părinții ar trebui să înceteze să le facă pentru a preveni rănile emoționale pe termen lung.
title_translated: 12 things that a trauma therapist from childhood "begges" parents immediately cease to do
description_translated: When parents adopt certain harmful behaviors, they prepare their children for failure in adult life. A therapist has made a list of things that parents should stop doing to prevent long -term emotional wounds.

title: Cum a reușit un fermier să scăpe de coropișnițele din grădină: „Se pune la fiecare plantă"
description: Grădinăritul este o activitate plăcută și relaxantă, dar nu este lipsită de provocări. Unul dintre cele mai frecvente obstacole cu care se confruntă grădinarii sunt dăunătorii, iar printre cei mai comuni și mai greu de combătut se numără coropișnițele.
title_translated: How a farmer managed to get rid of the corpoşnites in the garden: "put on each plant"
description_translated: Gardening is a pleasant and relaxing activity, but it is not without challenges. One of the most common obstacles that the gardeners face are pests, and among the most common and difficult to fight are the corruption.

title: "Vor exista sancțiuni grave pentru români". Avertismentul dur al Ambasadei SUA la București
description: Ambasada americană în România a reluat joi, 27 martie, avertismentele la adresa românilor care vor să traverseze Atlanticul ca turiști sau în interes de serviciu. Într-un mesaj postat pe rețeaua X, deținută de Elon Musk, oficialii SUA le cer cetățenilor români să-și "demonstreze intenția de a respecta legile" altfel vor exista "sancțiuni grave".
title_translated: "There will be serious sanctions for Romanians." Hard Warning of the US Embassy in Bucharest
description_translated: The American Embassy in Romania resumed on Thursday, March 27, the warnings against Romanians who want to cross the Atlantic as tourists or in the interest of service. In a message posted on the X network, owned by Elon Musk, US officials ask Romanian citizens to "demonstrate their intention to respect the laws" otherwise there will be "serious sanctions".

title: Marius Tucă denunță tendințele occidentale ale țării: Când e vorba de cenzură în România, e unanimitate
description: Marius Tucă critică tendințele occidentale care, sub pretextul democrației, conduc spre cenzură și restricționarea libertății de exprimare în presa românească, conform Mediafax. Citește mai departe...

title: Procesul lui Nicolas Sarkozy: Procurorii francezi cer o pedeapsă de 7 ani de închisoare pentru fostul președinte
description: Procurorii au cerut joi ca fostul președinte francez Nicolas Sarkozy să fie condamnat la șapte ani de închisoare pentru că ar fi acceptat bani de la regretatul dictator libian Muammar Gaddafi pentru a-și finanța prima campanie prezidențială.
title_translated: Nicolas Sarkozy's trial: French prosecutors demand a 7 -year prison sentence for former president
description_translated: Prosecutors asked on Thursday that former French president Nicolas Sarkozy be sentenced to seven years in prison for accepting money from the late Libyan dictator Muammar Gaddafi to finance his first presidential campaign.

title: Se pregătește o tranzacție de proporții: Zeci de magazine Mega și Profi vor fi vândute către un jucător surpriză în piață
description: Peste 80 de magazine Profi și Mega au fost scoase la vânzare conform indicațiilor date de Consiliul Concurenței ce a autorizat preluarea Profi de gigantul olandezo-belgian Ahold Delhaize, informează Mediafax. Citește mai departe...
title_translated: Prepare a large transaction: Dozens of Mega and Profi stores will be sold to a surprise player in the market
description_translated: Over 80 Profi and Mega stores were put up for sale according to the indications given by the Competition Council, which authorized Profi's taking over the Dutch-Belgian giant Ahold Delhaize, informs Mediafax. Read on ...

title: Cea mai gustoasă friptură de miel, chiar la tine acasă: care este secretul
description: Friptura de miel este un preparat deosebit, adesea asociat cu mesele de sărbătoare, dar și cu momentele petrecute în familie. Pentru a obține o friptură de miel perfectă, care să fie atât aromată, cât și suculentă, trebuie respectate câteva reguli esențiale. Iar secretul stă în detalii, iar un ingredient cheie este prepararea corespunzătoare a cărnii și ungerea constantă a acesteia. Iată rețeta pe care o recomandă celebrul gastronom Radu Anton Roman, oferită în lucrarea sa "Bucate, vinuri și obiceiuri românești".
title_translated: The most tasty roast of lamb, right at your home: what is the secret
description_translated: Lamb roast is a special preparation, often associated with holiday tables, but also with the moments spent in the family. In order to obtain a perfect lamb steak, which are both flavored and succulent, some essential rules must be followed. And the secret lies in details, and a key ingredient is the proper preparation of the meat and its constant anointing. Here is the recipe recommended by the famous gastronomist Radu Anton Roman, offered in his work "Romanian dishes and customs".

title: Un bărbat din Ilfov a murit după ce a fost torturat în propria casă. Trei suspecți, identificați de polițiști
description: Un bărbat din Măgurele, județul Ilfov, a murit după ce a fost torturat în propria locuință de mai mulți indivizi mascați. Aceștia i-au cerut codul pin al cardului bancar, iar când a refuzat să-l dezvăluie, aceștia l-au legat cu cabluri și l-au bătut crunt. Trei suspecți au fost identificați după ce au încercat să folosească cardul victimei la un bancomat din Tulcea.
title_translated: An Ilfov man died after being tortured in his own house. Three suspects identified by police
description_translated: A man from Măgurele, Ilfov County, died after being tortured in his own home by several masked individuals. They asked for the PIN code of the bank card, and when he refused to reveal it, they tied him with cables and beat him. Three suspects were identified after trying to use the victim's card at an ATM in Tulcea.

However, we all know that any suspension can be suspended at some point, so it is important to understand this program in detail and what will happen after "suspension suspension".

title: Planul secret al lui Trump, restaurarea imperiului lui Putin. SUA țin pistolul la capul lui Zelenski pentru o cerere
description: Războiul de peste 1.100 de zile al Moscovei din țara vecină continuă în ciuda acordurilor dintre Statele Unite, Rusia și Ucraina încheiate în Arabia Saudită. Însă un plan secret al lui Donald Trump dezvăluit vizează restaurarea imperiului gazelor lui Vladimir Putin. În același timp, America ține pistolul la capul lui Zelenski, cu cereri fără precedent, demne de secolul al XIX-lea.
title_translated: Trump's secret plan, Restoration of Putin's empire. US hold the gun at Zelenski's head for a request
description_translated: The war of over 1,100 days of Moscow in the neighboring country continues despite agreements between the United States, Russia and Ukraine concluded in Saudi Arabia. But a secret plan of Donald Trump revealed is aimed at restoring Vladimir Putin's gases. At the same time, America holds the gun at Zelenski's head, with unprecedented requests, worthy of the 19th century.

title: George Simion: Globaliștii încearcă să rupă UE de Statele Unite
description: În perioada 26-28 martie, Cluj-Napoca a fost gazda Summitului liderilor din grupul politic european ECR (Conservatorii și Reformiștii Europeni), un eveniment la care a participat și George Simion, liderul Alianței pentru Unirea Românilor (AUR). Într-un interviu acordat Realitatea Plus, Simion a oferit o perspectivă amplă asupra discuțiilor purtate și a implicațiilor acestora pentru România și Uniunea Europeană.
title_translated: George Simion: Globalists try to break the EU by the United States
description_translated: Between March 26-28, Cluj-Napoca was the host of the summit of leaders in the European Political Group (European Conservatives and Reformists), an event attended by George Simion, the leader of the Alliance for the Union of Romanians (Gold). In an interview with Realitatea Plus, Simion offered a wide perspective on the discussions and their implications for Romania and the European Union.

Eclipse a [...]

title: Cuvântul banal care ne poate aduce succesul: „Eu îmi învăț copiii să gândească cu ajutorul unui cuvânt”
description: De multe ori, cea mai mare barieră dintre noi și succes este propria noastră mentalitate. Din acest motiv, este important să știm cum trebuie să răspundem în fața provocărilor care ne ies în cale pentru a reuși să trecem cu bine peste orice problemă!
title_translated: The trivial word that can bring us success: "I teach my children to think with the help of a word"
description_translated: Often, the biggest barrier between us and success is our own mentality. For this reason, it is important to know how to respond in the face of the challenges that come out of our way to get well over any problem!

title: Dosare ale CIA dezvăluie unul dintre cele mai mari secrete ale lumii: Chivotul Legământului a fost găsit VIDEO
description: Conform Bibliei, Chivotul Legământului a fost construit de israeliți la scurt timp după ce au fugit din Egipt, în jurul secolului al XIII-lea î.Hr. Moise a așezat apoi tăblițele cu cele Zece Porunci în interior. Acum, CIA susține în documente declasificate că a găsit Chivotul Legământului în anul 1988, divulgând unul dintre cele mai mari secrete ale lumii.
title_translated: CIA files reveal one of the world's greatest secrets: The covenant ark was found video
description_translated: According to the Bible, the ark of the covenant was built by Israelites shortly after they fled from Egypt, around the 13th century BC. Moses then placed the tablets with the ten commandments inside. Now, the CIA claims in documents declassified that it has found the ark of the covenant in 1988, disclosing one of the greatest secrets of the world.

title: Litiul e istorie! Revoluție energetică: Japonia testează prima baterie reîncărcabilă pe bază de uraniu
description: Baterii din deșeuri nucleare? Da, e posibil! Primul prototip a fost deja prezentat în Japonia. O echipă de cercetători din Japonia a creat prima baterie reîncărcabilă din lume care utilizează uraniu, o inovație ce ar putea transforma atât stocarea energiei, cât și gestionarea Citește mai departe...
title_translated: Lithium is history! Energy Revolution: Japan tests the first uranium -based rechargeable battery
description_translated: Nuclear waste batteries? Yes, it's possible! The first prototype has already been presented in Japan. A team of researchers in Japan has created the first rechargeable battery in the world using uranium, an innovation that could transform both energy storage and management read further ...

title: Originea misterioasă a tătarilor. Istoricii încă încearcă să înțeleagă de unde provenea această populație
description: De-a lungul secolelor, tătarii au fost o prezență constantă la hotarele statelor românești. Iar de-a lungul timpului, cei mai mulți oameni au considerat că această populație războinică era de origine mongolă.
title_translated: The mysterious origin of the Tatars. Historians are still trying to understand where this population came from
description_translated: Over the centuries, the Tatars have been a constant presence at the borders of the Romanian states. And over time, most people have considered that this warrior population was of Mongolian origin.

title: Anca Todoni, la titlul 3
description: „Putem avea o urmașă pentru Simona Halep. La 20 de ani, Anca Todoni are toate loviturile, este dârză, joacă cu nerv. Este bine ce face, este pe drumul cel bun. O urmăresc de câțiva ani și sunt optimist. Cred că la vârsta asta Simona nu avea atâtea lovituri ca Todoni, însă o jucătoare cu ambiția Simonei se naște la 100 de ani. Anca poate călca pe urmele Simonei Halep”, ne-a spus Viorel Simionașcu, antrenor de tenis.
title_translated: Anca Todoni, at Title 3
description_translated: "We can have a descendant for Simona Halep. At the age of 20, Anca Todoni has all the blows, she is daring, she plays with nerves. It is good, she is on the right track. I have been watching her for a few years and I am optimistic. I think at this age, Simona did not have as many blows, but a player with the ambition of Simona. Viorel Simionașcu, tennis coach.

title: Gabriel Aldea, Investimental: Marea problemă pe care o au investitorii cu experienţă este supradiversificarea. Este necesară o abordare dinamică a portofoliului
description: Diversificarea este o modalitate foarte bună de a reduce riscurile şi, implicit, de a obţine randamente mai bune din investiţii în context de volatilitate. Ea se poate face la nivel de instrumente, la nivel de piaţă sau de pieţe, dar investitorii, chiar şi cei mai experimentaţi, pică adesea în capcana supradiversificării.
title_translated: Gabriel Aldea, invested: The big problem that experienced investors have is oversized. A dynamic approach to the portfolio is required
description_translated: Diversification is a very good way to reduce risks and, implicitly, to obtain better yields from investments in volatility context. It can be done at the level of tools, at market or market level, but investors, even the most experienced, often fall into the oversized trap.

title: Anularea alegerilor din România, motivul problemelor în relația cu SUA. Băsescu: Singura solicitare este "alegeri corecte"
description: Traian Băsescu atacă dur decizia de anulare a alegerilor și susține că acesta este, de fapt, motivul problemelor în relația România cu SUA. Mai mult, fostul președinte spune că nu există niciun dubiu că la vârful țării s-a pus în aplicare un plan elaborat pentru a justifica anularea fără probe a alegerilor prezidențiale.
title_translated: Canceling the elections in Romania, the reason for the problems in relation to the US. Basescu: The only request is "correct choices"
description_translated: Traian Basescu has harshly attack the decision to cancel the elections and claim that this is, in fact, the reason in the Romania's relationship with the US. Moreover, the former president says that there is no doubt that at the top of the country an elaborate plan was implemented to justify the annulment of the presidential elections.

title: Donald Trump anunță că TikTok va fi vândut până pe 5 aprilie. Ce cumpărători sunt interesați
description: TikTok se pregătește pentru o schimbare majoră de proprietate în Statele Unite, după ce președintele american Donald Trump a declarat că vânzarea rețelei sociale trebuie finalizată până pe 5 aprilie. Termenul a fost stabilit de administrația sa ca ultimă zi înainte de intrarea în vigoare a unei posibile interdicții, în contextul preocupărilor privind securitatea națională.
title_translated: Donald Trump announces that Tiktok will be sold until April 5th. What buyers are interested
description_translated: Tiktok is preparing for a major property change in the United States, after US President Donald Trump said the sale of social network should be completed until April 5th. The deadline was established by his administration as the last day before the entry into force of a possible prohibition, in the context of national security concerns.

title: După plafonarea marjelor retailerilor, Ungaria anunţă noi intervenţii pe pieţe şi în economie. Vizate sunt fondurile de investiţii, băncile şi companiile de telecomunicaţii
description: Cu economia de aşteptat să în­re­gistreze o creştere de 2,5% în acest an, în scădere de la creşterea de 3,4% prognozată anterior, o inflaţie peste aşteptări şi un deficit budgetar depă­şind regulat ţintele precedente, gu­ver­nul ungar a anunţat noi pentru îm­bunătăţirea indicatorilor, scrie Bloomberg.
title_translated: After capping the margins of retailers, Hungary announces new interventions in markets and economics. Targeted are the investment funds, banks and telecommunications companies
description_translated: With the expected economy to register an increase of 2.5% this year, decreasing since the increase of 3.4% previously forecast, an inflation above expectations and a budgeting deficit regularly exceeding the previous targets, the Hungarian government announced to improve indicators, writes Bloomberg.

title: ANCOM a dublat perioada de consultare publică pentru decizia prin care va obliga Digi – furnizorul dominant de servicii de internet şi cablu TV - să le ofere acces rivalilor la reţeaua sa fixă din 6.500 de localităţi
description: Abia lansată - procedura prin care Autoritatea de Reglementare în Comunicaţii (ANCOM) va obliga Digi – operatorul dominant de pe piaţa de cablu TV şi net fix să ofere acces rivalilor la reţeaua sa fixă continuă cu o amânare: autoritatea a decis că este nevoie nu de o lună ci de două luni de zile pentru perioada de consultare publică a ordinului.
title_translated: ANCOM has doubled the period of public consultation for the decision by which it will oblige Digi - the dominant provider of Internet and cable TV - to offer access to the rivals to its fixed network from 6,500 localities
description_translated: Only launched - the procedure by which the Communications Regulatory Authority (ANCOM) will oblige Digi - the dominant operator on the cable TV market and a fixed net to provide access to the fixed network continues with a postponement: the authority decided that it is necessary not a month but for two months for the public consultation period.

title: „O confruntare militară va fi aproape inevitabilă, în acest caz”. Avertisment în Parlamentul Franței

title: Descoperire neașteptată în locul învierii lui Iisus, după 2.000 de ani: A ieșit la iveală de sub biserica din Ierusalim VIDEO
description: O nouă descoperire arheologică făcută la locul unde se crede că Iisus Hristos a fost îngropat și apoi a înviat. Aceasta ar putea oferi noi dovezi care susțin scrierile din Biblie. O echipă de la Universitatea Sapienza din Roma a descoperit, după 2.000 de ani, rămășițele unei grădini antice sub fundația Bisericii Sfântului Mormânt din Ierusalim, Israel, care confirmă relatările din Evanghelia lui Ioan.
title_translated: Unexpected discovery instead of Jesus' resurrection after 2,000 years: it came to light under the Church of Jerusalem Video
description_translated: A new archaeological discovery made at the place where Jesus Christ is believed was buried and then raised. This could provide new evidence to support the Bible writings. A team from Sapienza University in Rome discovered, after 2,000 years, the remains of an ancient garden under the Foundation of the Church of the Holy Sepulcher in Jerusalem, Israel, which confirms the reports in the Gospel of John.

title: „Ciuma oilor” dă peste cap piața românească de carne de miel. Cum arată prețurile pentru friptura de pe masa de Paște în contextul problemelor cu exporturile
description: Fermierii români care exportă ovine sunt afectați de restricțiile impuse din cauza pestei micilor rumegătoare. În timp ce exportatorii au probleme pe piața europeană, pentru cumpărători acest lucru s-ar putea traduce în stabilitate de prețuri sau scumpiri mai ușoare la masa de Paște, a explicat un profesor universitar pentru Ziare.com.

title: SUA avertizează România că „pacea nu este gratuită”. Ambasada americană citează Articolul 3 din Tratatul NATO

description_translated: The US Embassy in Bucharest sent a message on Thursday that the allocation of 2% of GDP for defense is no longer sufficient, and NATO allies will have to spend more for "a safe and secure future".

title: 7 lucruri pe care ar trebui să le învățăm de la animale pentru o viață mai împlinită
description: 7 lucruri de învățat de la animale pentru o viață mai împlinită. De la cea mai mică insectă de pe Pământ până la cel mai feroce leu african, animalele ne dau lecții de viață. Trebuie doar să fim atenți la comportamentul lor și să tragem concluzii personale care să ne ajute să îmbunătățim condiția umană. Nu oricine însă are timpul să urmărească exemplele oferite, așa că e mai simplu să învețe de la animalul de companie pe care îl are sau pe care îl au cei din jur.
title_translated: 7 things we should learn from animals for a more fulfilled life
description_translated: 7 things to learn from animals for a more fulfilled life. From the slightest insect on Earth to the fiercest African leu, animals give us life lessons. We just have to pay attention to their behavior and draw personal conclusions that will help us improve the human condition. But not everyone has the time to follow the examples offered, so it is easier to learn from the pet he has or have those around him.

title: Sorin Pâslaru, ZF: Donald Trump a făcut ce a promis. A scos tarifele din sac. Întrebarea e simplă: vrei să consumi ieftin de oriunde sau accepţi să consumi scump, eventual si prost, dar din ţara ta? E o întrebare istorică. Lumea a fost condusă de ideea ieftin de oriunde. Va mai putea fi întoarsă? Şi cu ce costuri?
title_translated: Sorin Pâslaru, ZF: Donald Trump did what he promised. He removed the rates from the bag. The question is simple: do you want to consume cheap from anywhere or do you accept to consume expensive, possibly and stupid, but from your country? It's a historical question. The world has been led by the cheap idea from anywhere. Could it be turned on? And what costs?

title: Comisia Europeană alocă 34 de milioane de euro pentru proiecte de integrare a migranţilor
description: Comisia Europeană a anunţat vineri o nouă cerere de oferte pentru proiecte de integrare a migranţilor şi care vor beneficia de granturi în valoare de 34 de milioane de euro, a anunţat executivul comunitar într-un comunicat citat de agenţia EFE.
title_translated: The European Commission allocates 34 million euros for migrants integration projects
description_translated: The European Commission announced on Friday a new request for offers for migrants integration projects and which will benefit from grants worth 34 million euros, the Community Executive announced in a statement quoted by the EFE agency.

title: Excursii exotice: cum planifici vacanța perfectă într-un colț de paradis (P)
description: Vacanțele exotice sunt un vis pentru mulți dintre noi – o evadare din cotidian într-un loc în care totul pare desprins dintr-un film: plaje cu nisip fin, ape turcoaz, palmieri legănându-se în briză și o atmosferă relaxantă, care îți reîncarcă bateriile. Fie că alegi o destinație din Asia de Sud-Est, Africa, Caraibe sau Oceanul Indian, excursiile exotice sunt o combinație între relaxare, aventură și descoperire culturală. Dar pentru ca totul să meargă perfect, planificarea atentă este cheia.
title_translated: Exotic trips: How to plan the perfect holiday in a paradise corner (P)
description_translated: Exotic holidays are a dream for many of us-an escape from everyday life in a place where everything seems detached from a movie: fine sandy beaches, turquoise waters, palm trees and a relaxing atmosphere, which recharge your batteries. Whether you choose a destination in Southeast Asia, Africa, Caribbean or Indian Ocean, exotic trips are a combination of relaxation, adventure and cultural discovery. But for everything to go perfectly, careful planning is the key.

title: SRI spune că monitorizează permanent activităţile de dezinformare şi propagandă în mediul online
description: Serviciul Român de Informații (SRI) a publicat un comunicat de presă pe Facebook în care explică modul în care analizează și combate amenințările cibernetice legate de propaganda și dezinformarea din mediul online, conform atribuțiilor sale legale.
title_translated: SRI says it permanently monitors misinformation and propaganda activities in the online environment
description_translated: The Romanian Intelligence Service (SRI) has published a press release on Facebook in which it explains how it analyzes and combats cyber threats related to propaganda and misinformation from the online environment, according to its legal tasks.

title: Armenia adoptă proiectul de lege pentru a lansa procesul de aderare la UE

description_translated: The Mediafaxpresident of Armenia promulgated a draft law on Friday that establishes a legal basis for the country to go to the EU. Armenia article adopts the draft law to launch the EU accession process appears in Mediafax.

title: Vânzătoare tâlhărită cu pistolul, la Constanța, de doi indivizi cu cagule

title: Diana Șoșoacă și câțiva oameni din partidul ei s-au aruncat în mare, ținându-se de mâini VIDEO

title: Horoscop Aprilie 2025: Începe o nouă eră pentru fieecare zodie
description: La începutul lunii, pe 1 aprilie, Neptun a intrat în Berbec pentru prima dată în 165 de ani, marcând o perioadă de descoperire personală și oportunități de a avansa cu o înțelegere mai clară a sinelui. Sezonul retrogradărilor se încheie, de asemenea, în această lună, cu Mercur revenind în mers direct pe 7 aprilie, urmat de Venus pe 12 aprilie.​
title_translated: Horoscope April 2025: Start a new era for each sign sign
description_translated: At the beginning of the month, on April 1, Neptune entered Aries for the first time in 165 years, marking a period of personal discovery and opportunities to advance with a clearer understanding of the self. The relegation season also ends this month, with Mercury returning directly on April 7, followed by Venus on April 12.

title: Propunerea lui Elon Musk pentru Europa: 'Să fie efectiv o zonă de liber schimb între Europa şi America de Nord'
description: Miliardarul american Elon Musk a declarat sâmbătă că speră ca în viitor să vadă o libertate totală a comerţului între Statele Unite şi Europa, vorbind la câteva zile după ce preşedintele american Donald Trump a anunţat impunerea de taxe vamale partenerilor comerciali, relatează Citește mai departe...

title: DSU sesizează CNCD, după ce șefa UPU Constanța ar fi fost schimbată din funcție pentru că e femeie
description: MediafaxDeclarația făcută de managera Spitalului Județean Constanța referitoare la motivele schimbării șefei Unității de Primiri Urgențe, respectiv necesitatea numirii unui bărbat, este profund discriminatoare și ofensatoare, apreciază reprezentanții DSU. Aceștia au anunțat că vor sesiza Consiliul Național pentru Combaterea Discriminării (CNCD).Articolul DSU sesizează CNCD, după ce șefa UPU Constanța ar fi fost schimbată din funcție pentru că e femeie apare prima dată în Mediafax.

They announced that they will notify the National Council for Combating Discrimination (CNCD). The DSU article notices CNCD, after the head of UPU Constanța had been changed because it is a woman first appears in Mediafax.

title: Străzi deschise 2025. Revine evenimentul menit să-i scoată din case pe bucureșteni
description: „Străzi deschise – Bucureşti, Promenadă urbană” va începe în 12 aprilie şi se va încheia în 12 octombrie. Pentru prima dată, „Străzi deschise – Bucureşti” îşi extinde prezenţa în cartierele Bucureştiului şi dezvoltă, la iniţiativa ARCUB – Centrul Cultural al Municipiului Bucureşti, o colaborare cu alte proiecte importante dedicate comunităţii locale. Anul acesta, „Străzi deschise” – în cartiere – are loc în parteneriat cu evenimente de referinţă precum: Street Delivery, Dâmboviţa Apă Dulce, Bazar de Cotroceni, Dorobanţi Street Art Festival şi New Urban Habits.
title_translated: Open streets 2025. The event meant to take out the people of Bucharest.
description_translated: "Open streets - Bucharest, urban promenade" will start on April 12 and will end on October 12. For the first time, "open streets - Bucharest" extends its presence in the neighborhoods of Bucharest and develops, at the ARCUB initiative - the Cultural Center of the Municipality of Bucharest, a collaboration with other important projects dedicated to the local community. This year, "open streets" - in neighborhoods - takes place in partnership with reference events such as: Street Delivery, Dâmboviţa Frese Water, Cotroceni Bazaar, Dorobanti Street Art Festival and New Urban Habits.

title: Toate mesajele galeriilor la Rapid - Dinamo: derapaj rasist și atacuri în valuri la adresa conducerii
description: La partida Rapid - Dinamo, de duminică seara, din etapa a treia a play-off-ului, suporterii celor două echipe au afișat mai multe bannere în tribune, unele extrem de sugestive, cu dedicație pentru conducere, din partea Rapidului, respectiv pentru adversari, din partea celor de la Dinamo.Fanii giuleșteni au protestat în startul confruntării și nu au intrat pe stadion încă de la început. ...

The Giulesti Fanii protested at the beginning of the confrontation and did not enter the stadium. ... ...

title: Expoziția „Ioan Andreescu. Adevărul și imaginația” la Art Safari: 7 martie – 27 iulie

description_translated: The exhibition from Art Safari, organized 175 years after the birth of the great artist, assumes the difficult mission to bring to the public a lot of the most important works signed by Ioan Andreescu, spread in museum and private collections.

title: Dinamo, la un pas de medaliile de bronz în campionatul feminin de volei

title: Cât va ține valul de frig arctic care a cuprins România. Temperaturile au scăzut și la -18 grade
description: Episoadele de iarnă târzie au continuat duminică seară în mai multe zone din țară. În loc de verdeață, la munte vedem zilele acestea o mare de alb.
