description_translated: Late winter episodes continued on Sunday evening in several areas of the country. Instead of greenery, we see a sea of ​​white these days.

title: Trump compară tarifele globale cu administrarea de medicamente
description: Donald Trump a declarat că guvernele străine ar trebui să plătească „o grămadă de bani” pentru a ridica taxele americane, pe care le-a descris drept „medicamente”, potrivit Reuters. Pieţele financiare semnalează o altă săptămână de pierderi abrupte.
title_translated: Trump compares global tariffs with drug administration
description_translated: Donald Trump said foreign governments should pay "a lot of money" to pick up American taxes, which he described as "medicines", according to Reuters. The financial markets signal another week of steep losses.

title: Regele Charles face o vizită de stat în Italia, după problemele de sănătate

title: Panică pe burse după taxele vamale anunțate de SUA. Donald Trump: „Uneori trebuie să iei un tratament pentru a te vindeca”
description: Donald Trump a relativizat duminică panica bursieră cauzată de noile sale taxe vamale, comparând-o cu "un tratament" destinat să vindece bolile economiei americane, scrie AFP.
title_translated: Panic on scholarships after the customs duties announced by the US. Donald Trump: "Sometimes you have to take a treatment to heal you"
description_translated: Donald Trump relativized Sunday's panic Panic caused by his new customs duties, comparing it with "a treatment" intended to cure the diseases of the American economy, writes AFP.

title: DN Agrar Group aşteaptă o creştere a businessului de peste 20% în 2025. „Luăm în considerare o creştere cu 10% a producţiei de lapte.“
description: DN Agrar Group (simbol bursier DN), cea mai mare fermă integrată zootehnică din România, lider în producţia de lapte de vacă, şi-a bugetat pentru 2025 un profit net de 38,8 mil. lei, în creştere cu 22,3% comparativ cu rezul­tatul net din 2024, la afaceri de 211,6 mil. lei, plus 20,4%, conform calculelor realizate de ZF pe baza bugetului de venituri şi cheltuieli aferent anului 2025 şi a situaţiilor financiare preliminare pe 2024.
title_translated: DN Agrar Group expects an increase in business of over 20% in 2025. "We consider a 10% increase in milk production."
description_translated: DN Agrar Group (Symbol Scholarship DN), the largest integrated zootechnical farm in Romania, leader in the production of cow's milk, has budgeted for 2025 a net profit of 38.8 million lei, increasing by 22.3% compared to the net result of 2024, in business of 211.6 million lei, plus 20.4%, according to the calculations made by the ZF and the income budget. related to 2025 and preliminary financial statements on 2024.

title: UE propune SUA taxe vamale reciproce zero. Trump știa de ofertă când a pornit cel mai dur război economic din ultimul secol
description: Uniunea Europeană (UE) a propus Statelor Unite o scutire - totală şi reciprocă - de taxe vamale la produsele industriale - inclusiv maşini -, anunţă luni preşedinta Comisiei Europene (CE) Ursula von der Leyen, cu scopul de a evita un război comercial.
title_translated: The EU proposes the USA mutual customs duties. Trump knew the offer when the hardest economic war started in the last century
description_translated: The European Union (EU) has proposed to the United States a total and mutual exemption - of customs duties for industrial products - including cars -, announces on Monday the president of the European Commission (EC) Ursula von der Leyen, in order to avoid a trade war.

title: Noua politică tarifară a Washingtonului atacă un pilon sacru pentru economii din întreaga lume, la care aliaţi şi rivali ai SUA deopotrivă nu sunt dispuşi să renunţe: taxa pe valoarea adăugată
description: În momentul lansării tăvălugului de tarife la nivel global săptămâna trecută, preşedintele Trump a indicat „taxele TVA exorbitante“ drept unii dintre factorii din spatele deficitului comercial în creştere puternică al Americii.
title_translated: Washington's new tariff policy attacks a sacred pillar for savings around the world, to which US allies and rivals are not willing to give up: value added tax
description_translated: At the time of launching the global tariff roller last week, President Trump indicated the "exorbitant VAT taxes" as some of the factors behind the highly growing commercial deficit of America.

title: Dezordinea mondială provocată de protecţionismul comercial al lui Donald Trump a aruncat bursele lumii în haos şi împinge SUA şi Germania spre recesiune. Se vorbeşte de inflaţie în America şi deflaţie în Europa. Însă impredictibilitatea Washingtonului face apetisantă predictabilitatea Europei
title_translated: Donald Trump's commercial protectionism has thrown the world's scholarships and pushes the US and Germany to recession. There is talk of inflation in America and deflation in Europe. But the unpredictability of Washington makes appetizing the predictability of Europe

title: Apariție controversată la Moscova, în plin război între Rusia și Ucraina » Francesco Totti, acasă la Vladimir Putin
description: Francesco Totti (48 de ani), legenda celor de la AS Roma, se află în Rusia, la Moscova. Acesta a fost surprins luni pe aeroportul capitalei ruse, la sosire. Va participa la un eveniment organizat de o casă de pariuri al cărei ambasador este.Numeroase panouri cu chipul său au împânzit Moscova în ultimele săptămâni, stârnind controverse în Italia, ținând cont de invazia declanșată de Rusia în Ucraina, pe 24 februarie 2022.VIDEO. ...
title_translated: Controversial appearance in Moscow, in full war between Russia and Ukraine »Francesco Totti, at Vladimir Putin
description_translated: Francesco Toti (48 years old), the legend of AS Roma, is in Russia, in Moscow. He was caught on Monday at the Russian Capital Airport on arrival. He will participate in an event organized by a bookmaker whose ambassador is. Numerous panels with his face have entered Moscow in recent weeks, arousing controversy in Italy, taking into account the invasion triggered by Russia in Ukraine, on February 24, 2022.Video. ... ...

title: Sebastian Burduja: La această oră, peste 40% din energia României este din hidrocentrale. Anunțul ministrului despre Hidroelectrica
description: Sebastian Burduja a anunțat că, în prezent, peste 40% din energia României este în hidrocentrale și „de aceea este vital că am reușit să asigurăm funcționarea tuturor celor șase grupuri de la Porțile de Fier I, după lucrări integral românești, derulate de Hidroelectrica-Hidroserv-UCMH (UCM Reșița)”. Hidroelectrica a semnat un contract pentru primul proiect de stocare a energiei în baterii din portofoliul companiei, a mai spus ministrul Energiei.
title_translated: Sebastian Burduja: At this time, over 40% of Romania's energy is made of hydroelectric plants. Minister's ad about Hidroelectrica
description_translated: Sebastian Burduja has announced that, at present, over 40% of Romania's energy is in hydroelectric plants and "therefore it is vital that we managed to ensure the operation of all six groups from Iron I gates, after fully Romanian works, carried out by Hidroelectrica-Hidroserv-Uucm (UCM Reșița)". Hidroelectrica has signed a contract for the first energy storage project in batteries in the company's portfolio, said the Minister of Energy.

title: Secarea Mării Aral a afectat chiar şi mişcarea tectonică a Pământului. Impactul asupra scoarţei terestre şi astenosferei
description: Secarea Mării Aral din Asia Centrală a fost nu doar o catastrofă ecologică, ci a afectat şi mişcarea rocilor aflate la zeci de kilometri sub suprafaţa Terrei, potrivit unui studiu publicat luni, informează AFP. Citește mai departe...
title_translated: The section of the Aral Sea has even affected the tectonic movement of the Earth. The impact on the terrestrial bark and asthenosfepore
description_translated: The Aral Sea Sea in Central Asia was not only an ecological catastrophe, but also affected the movement of rocks tens of kilometers below the surface of the Earth, according to a study published Monday, AFP reports. Read on ...

title: Cel mai utilizat medicament pentru durere în România duce la schimbări semnificative în comportamentul uman
description: Unul dintre cele mai folosite medicamente din lume, acetaminofenul (paracetamolul), ar putea avea efecte mult mai profunde decât simpla ameliorare a durerii, susțin cercetătorii. Citește mai departe...
title_translated: The most used pain drug in Romania leads to significant changes in human behavior
description_translated: One of the most used drugs in the world, acetaminophen (paracetamol), could have much deeper effects than simply relieving pain, researchers say. Read on ...

title: Escrocherie de milioane cu ștampila BNR: Un român a fost victima unui 'thriller' cu bătăi, acte false și minciuni ticluite de doi străini
description: Au pretins că vin din partea BNR și au pus la cale o înșelătorie de zile mari. Doi cetățeni străini au reușit să păcălească un bărbat din Sectorul 5, făcându-l să le înmâneze aproape 24. Citește mai departe...
title_translated: Millions scam with the BNR stamp: a Romanian was the victim of a 'thriller' with beats, false acts and lies of two foreigners
description_translated: They claimed to come from the NBR and set up a big day scam. Two foreign citizens managed to trick a man in Sector 5, making him hand over them. Read more ...

title: Românca Andreea Mottram, ucisă în SUA. Fiica ei adoptivă de 16 ani și o prietenă sunt acuzate de crimă și vor fi judecate ca adulți
description: Andreea Mottram, o româncă de 47 de ani stabilită în SUA și implicată în sprijinirea refugiaților, a fost găsită înjunghiată într-o locuință din statul Utah. Fiica ei adoptivă, în vârstă de 16 ani, și o prietenă a acesteia, sunt acuzate de crimă și urmează să fie judecate ca adulți. Cele două adolescente au fost arestate după ce au fost găsite în California, la câteva zile după crimă, relatează The Independent.
title_translated: Romanian Andreea Mottram, killed in the USA. Her 16 -year -old adoptive daughter and a friend are charged by crime and will be judged as adults
description_translated: Andreea Mottram, a 47-year-old Romanian established in the US and involved in supporting refugees, was found stabbed in a home in the state of Utah. Her adoptive daughter, aged 16, and a friend of her, are accused of murder and are to be judged as adults. The two teenagers were arrested after being found in California a few days after the crime, The Independent reports.

title: Gabi Balint nu i-a menajat pe olteni, la pauza meciului CFR Cluj - Universitatea Craiova
description: Gabi Balint nu i-a menajat pe olteni, la pauza meciului CFR Cluj - Universitatea Craiova
title_translated: Gabi Balint did not clean the Olteni, at the break of the match CFR Cluj - Craiova University
description_translated: Gabi Balint did not clean the Olteni, at the break of the match CFR Cluj - Craiova University

title: Coreea de Sud stabilește data alegerilor prezidențiale anticipate pe 3 iunie
description: MediafaxPrincipalii candidați și-au anunțat marți intenția de a intra în cursă, după ce Coreea de Sud a stabilit oficial data de 3 iunie pentru alegerile prezidențiale anticipate, declanșate de înlăturarea din funcție, săptămâna trecută, a președintelui demis Yoon Suk Yeol, transmite Reuters.Articolul Coreea de Sud stabilește data alegerilor prezidențiale anticipate pe 3 iunie apare prima dată în Mediafax.
title_translated: South Korea sets the date of anticipated presidential elections on June 3
description_translated: The Mediafaxpropripal candidates announced on Tuesday the intention to enter the race, after South Korea officially set the date of June 3 for the anticipated presidential elections, triggered by the removal, last week, of President Demis Yoon Suk Yeol, reports Reuters.

title: Parcurile din București au devenit un refugiu pentru păsările migratoare. Unde pot fi văzute și cu ce este recomandat să le hrănim
description: Zeci de specii de păsări migratoare au găsit refugiu în jurul lacurilor din București, astfel că parcurile Plumbuita, Fundeni și Sticlăriei au devenit adăposturi pentru rațe, gâște și lebede, potrivit TVR Info. Parcurile Plumbuita, Fundeni, Sticlăriei, delta Glina – adăposturi pentru rațe, gâște și lebede Parcul Plumbuita s-a transformat într-o atracție pentru locuitorii din București [...]
title_translated: The parks in Bucharest have become a refuge for migratory birds. Where they can be seen and what is recommended to feed them
description_translated: Dozens of species of migratory birds have found refuge around the lakes in Bucharest, so Plumbuita, Fundeni and Glassian parks have become shelters for ducks, geese and swans, according to TVR Info. Plumbuita Parks, Fundeni, Glass, Delta Glina-shelters for ducks, geese and swans Plumbuita Park has turned into an attraction for the inhabitants of Bucharest [...]

title: Infracțiunile de intrare ilegală în România ar putea fi cercetate și judecate doar după soluționarea cererilor de azil
description: De mai bine de doi ani, Parlamentul României se chinuie să adopte sau să respingă o lege inițiată de Guvernul României, prin premierul de atunci, Nicolae Ciucă, lege care vizează tratamentul din punct de vedere penal al celor care intră și rămân ilegal pe teritoriul României.
title_translated: The offenses of illegal entry in Romania could be investigated and judged only after the settlement of asylum applications
description_translated: For more than two years, the Romanian Parliament has been struggling to adopt or reject a law initiated by the Government of Romania, through the then prime minister, Nicolae Ciuca, a law concerning the criminal treatment of those who enter and remain illegal on the territory of Romania.

title: Record climatic doborât în 2025. Europa a înregistrat cea mai caldă lună martie din istorie
description: Europa a experimentat cea mai caldă lună martie de când se fac măsurători, în contextul în care schimbările climatice continuă să ducă temperaturile la niveluri fără precedent. La nivel global, luna trecută a fost a doua cea mai caldă lună martie înregistrată vreodată, fiind depășită doar de martie 2024, potrivit buletinului lunar emis de Serviciul Copernicus privind Schimbările Climatice (C3S) al UE, informează Reuters.
title_translated: Climatic Record Bloated in 2025. Europe recorded the hottest Moon in history
description_translated: Europe has experienced the hottest Moon March since measurements, in the context in which climate change continues to carry temperatures at unprecedented levels. Globally, last month was the second hottest Moon March ever, being exceeded only in March 2024, according to the monthly bulletin issued by the Copernicus Service on EU climate change (C3S), Reuters reports.

title: Ion Cristoiu: Ilie Bolojan și rețeaua sa duc o politică anti americană
description: Ilie Bolojan și rețeaua sa duc o politică anti-americană, spune Ion Cristoiu. Jurnalistul susține cu vehemență că rafala de reacții dure care a venit după declarația lui Dragoș Sprînceană cu privire la relația României cu Franța a plecat de asemenea de la președintele interimar.
title_translated: Ion Cristoiu: Ilie Bolojan and his network carry an anti -American policy
description_translated: Ilie Bolojan and his network carry an anti-American policy, says Ion Cristoiu. The journalist vehemently claims that the gust of harsh reactions that came after Dragoș's statement about Romania's relationship with France also left the interim president.

title: Medicii confirmă! Nicio șansă pentru Radu Drăgușin!
description: Radu Drăgușin e în refacere după operația de ligamente încrucișate suferită în februarie și nu este de așteptat să revină la antrenamente mai devreme de jumătatea lui iulie.Radu Drăgușin are un drum lung de parcurs până va putea fi văzut din nou pe teren. Un specialist în kinetoterapie care-l are în grijă a confirmat ceea ce Gazeta Sporturilor a dezvăluit recent, citând portarul Transfermarkt. ...
title_translated: The doctors confirm! No chance for Radu Drăgușin!
description_translated: Radu Drăgușin is in restoration after the cross -ligament operation suffered in February and is not expected to return to training earlier than July. A kinetotherapy specialist who cares for him confirmed what the Sports Gazeta has recently revealed, citing the Transfermarkt goalkeeper. ... ...

title: Mișcarea făcută de Apple cu puțin timp înainte ca Donald Trump să declare război comercial lumii
description: Apple a încercat să-şi facă un stoc de telefoane iPhone, aducând rapid în Statele Unite un mare număr de dispozitive, înainte ca Donald Trump să anunţe noile taxe pentru importuri. Conform Times of India, citat...
title_translated: Movement made by Apple shortly before Donald Trump declares commercial war
description_translated: Apple tried to stock up a stock of iPhone, quickly bringing a large number of devices to the United States before Donald Trump announces the new imports. According to Times of India, quoted ...

title: Tradiții de Paște la Alba Iulia. Atelier de încondeiat ouă și expoziție de artă populară la Palatul Principilor Transilvaniei
description: Ne pregătim pentru Paște, deși vremea ne arată contrariul. Iar la Alba Iulia puteți învăța cum să aveți o masă festivă cu tradiție.
title_translated: Easter traditions in Alba Iulia. Workshop to set eggs and exhibition of folk art at the Palace of Principles of Transylvania
description_translated: We are preparing for Easter, although the weather shows us the opposite. And in Alba Iulia you can learn how to have a festive meal with tradition.

title: Afacere de succes a unei românce a salvat o întreagă comună. A pus Tulcea pe hartă: „Oamenii nu sunt cifre într-o fabrică” De la 3 angajați a ajuns la 250
description: Cu 20 de ani în urmă, o tânără s-a întors în satul natal și a deschis o afacere care a salvat întreaga comunitate. La început, mica afacere avea doar trei angajați, dintre care unul era chiar patroana.
title_translated: A successful business of a Romanian saved a whole commune. Tulcea put on the map: "People are not figures in a factory" from 3 employees reached 250
description_translated: 20 years ago, a young woman returned to her native village and opened a business that saved the entire community. In the beginning, the small business had only three employees, one of whom was the patron.

title: Igor Dodon la picioarele Mamei Rusia! Întrevedere cu ambasadorul Moscovei pentru organizarea unei sărbători de amploare
description: Ambasadorul Federației Ruse la Chișinău, Oleg Ozerov, a avut o întrevedere cu fostul președinte al Republicii Moldova, rusofilul Igor Dodon. Citește mai departe...
title_translated: Igor Dodon at the feet of Mother Russia! Meeting with Moscow's ambassador to organize a large holiday
description_translated: The ambassador of the Russian Federation in Chisinau, Oleg Ozerov, had a meeting with the former president of the Republic of Moldova, the Russian Igor Dodon. Read on ...

title: Calificare dramatică pentru echipa din România, contra lui Inter. Cu cine va juca în finală
description: Echipa de baschet masculin CSO Voluntari a învins, marţi, în semifinalele Turneului Final Four al European North Basketball League (ENBL), formaţia Inter Bratislava, scor 107-103 (68-49), calificându-se în finala competiţiei. CSO Voluntari a jucat finala şi în 2024.
title_translated: Dramatic qualification for the Romanian team, against Inter. Who will play in the final
description_translated: The CSO Voluntari men's basketball team defeated the North Basketball League (ENBL), Inter Bratislava band, score 107-103 (68-49) on Tuesday, qualifying in the competition final. CSO Voluntari also played the final in 2024.

title: Răspunsul lui Nicușor Dan la invitația lui Ilie Bolojan de a participa la o dezbatere electorală între candidați la Cotroceni
description: Nicușor Dan a declarat că propunerea lui Ilie Bolojan de a participa la o dezbatere electorală la Cotroceni este „una bună”. Candidatul independent la alegeri a adăugat că Palatul Cotroceni ar fi „un cadru neutru și adecvat pentru o discuție echilibrată”.
title_translated: Nicușor Dan's response to Ilie Bolojan's invitation to participate in an electoral debate between candidates in Cotroceni
description_translated: Nicușor Dan said that Ilie Bolojan's proposal to participate in an electoral debate in Cotroceni is "a good one". The independent candidate for elections added that the Cotroceni Palace would be "a neutral and adequate framework for a balanced discussion".

title: Trump lovește din nou: Taxele vamale către China cresc la un record de 104%
description: Trump apasă pedala taxelor până la podea și surprinde scena politică și economică printr-o mutare bombă: Impunerea de taxe la importurile chinezești în SUA de 104%.
title_translated: Trump hits again: Customs taxes to China grow at a 104% record
description_translated: Trump press the fee pedal to the floor and captures the political and economic scene through a bomb move: imposing taxes in Chinese imports of 104%.

title: A construit un startup de aproape 40 milioane EUR în 5 ani, dar e îngrijorat de alegerile din România: „Lucrurile se schimbă la un ritm pe care eu nu l-am mai văzut”. VIDEO interviu cu Cornel Amariei, co-fondator dotLumen
description: Antreprenorul Cornel Amariei, CEO și co-fondator al dotLumen, un startup clujean de dispozitive de orientare pentru nevăzători, care a atras investiții de aproape 20 de milioane de euro în 5 ani și este evaluat spre...
title_translated: He has built a startup of almost 40 million EUR in 5 years, but he is worried about the elections in Romania: "Things change at a rhythm that I have never seen." Video interview with Cornel Amariei, co-founder dotlumen
description_translated: Entrepreneur Cornel Amariei, CEO and co-founder of Dotlumen, a Cluj startup of orientation devices for the blind, which has attracted investments of almost 20 million euros in 5 years and is evaluated towards ...

title: Iranul susţine că va purta discuţii indirecte cu Statele Unite
description: MediafaxIranul a anunţat, marţi, că va purta discuţii cu Statele Unite în format indirect, după ce Donald Trump a declarat că „negocierile directe” dintre SUA şi Iran cu privire la programul său nuclear vor începe sâmbătă în Oman.Articolul Iranul susţine că va purta discuţii indirecte cu Statele Unite apare prima dată în Mediafax.
title_translated: Iran claims to have indirect discussions with the United States
description_translated: Mediafaxiran announced on Tuesday that it will have discussions with the United States indirectly, after Donald Trump said that the "direct negotiations" between the US and Iran about its nuclear program will start in Oman. The article Iran claims that it will have indirect discussions with the United States appears in Mediafax.

title: Metodele de albire a dinților din comerț, mit sau realitate? Dr. Robert Ciocîrlan: „Dacă sunt folosite excesiv sau incorect, pot provoca sensibilitate”
description: Când vine vorba de o imagine impecabilă, știm cu toții că o dantură frumoasă joacă un rol crucial. Din păcate, medicii stomatologi susțin că mulți dintre români stau destul de prost la capitolul igienă orală, motiv pentru care ajung, în cabinetele stomatologice, cu probleme grave.
title_translated: Methods of whitening teeth in trade, myth or reality? Dr. Robert Ciocîrlan: "If they are used excessively or incorrectly, they can cause sensitivity"
description_translated: When it comes to an impeccable image, we all know that a beautiful tooth plays a crucial role. Unfortunately, dentists claim that many Romanians are quite bad in the oral hygiene chapter, which is why they arrive, in the dental offices, with serious problems.

title: Un fost fotbalist și om de afaceri, și-a schimbat radical viața după botezul religios la 45 de ani. Ce stil de viață are în prezent
description: După o viață marcată de controverse, fostul fotbalist Marian Aliuță a luat o decizie neașteptată care i-a schimbat complet parcursul: la vârsta de 45 de ani, s-a botezat din nou și a ales să urmeze un drum spiritual în cadrul Bisericii Profides, împreună cu soția sa, Mariana.
title_translated: A former footballer and businessman, radically changed his life after religious baptism at 45. What lifestyle does it currently have
description_translated: After a life marked by controversy, former footballer Marian Aliuță made an unexpected decision that completely changed his course: at the age of 45, he was baptized again and chose to follow a spiritual path within the Profides church, together with his wife, Mariana.

title: Doliu în fotbal. A murit celebrul portar care apăra fără mănuși
description: Fostul portar Manga, care a fost titular cu Brazilia la Cupa Mondială din 1966 şi s-a remarcat pentru că juca fără mănuşi, a murit la vârsta de 87 de ani, marţi, la Rio de Janeiro, a anunţat fostul său club Botafogo.
title_translated: Mourning in football. Died the famous porter who defended without gloves
description_translated: Former goalkeeper Manga, who was a holder with Brazil at the 1966 World Cup and was noted for playing without gloves, died at the age of 87, on Tuesday, in Rio de Janeiro, his former Botafogo club announced.

title: Ilinca Vandici, mai sinceră ca niciodată! Și-a refăcut viața după divorțul de Andrei Neacșu? „Suntem ființe ce au nevoie de un suflet alături”
description: Este una dintre cele mai de succes prezentatoare TV din România, admirată pentru frumusețe și talentul cu care i-a cucerit pe cei de acasă, a suferit puternic din dragoste, dar cu toate acestea alege să dea o șansă iubirii. Mai sinceră ca niciodată, Ilinca Vandici spune cum s-a reinventat.
title_translated: Ilinca Vandici, more sincere than ever! Did he restore his life after the divorce by Andrei Neacșu? "We are beings who need a soul next to it"
description_translated: He is one of the most successful TV presenter in Romania, admired for the beauty and the talent with which he conquered the home, suffered strongly out of love, but nevertheless he chooses to give a chance to love. More sincere than ever, Ilinca Vandici says how it reinvented.

title: Ce trebuie să pui în pământ, la rădăcina roșiilor, pentru a avea recoltă până la toamnă. Numai agricultorii bătrâni cunosc secretul
description: Roșiile sunt unele dintre cele mai îndrăgite legume din grădinile românilor. Gustul lor dulce-acrișor, aroma intensă și versatilitatea în bucătărie le fac indispensabile în orice gospodărie.
title_translated: What you have to put in the ground, at the root of the tomatoes, to have harvest until autumn. Only old farmers know the secret
description_translated: The tomatoes are some of the most beloved vegetables in the Romanian gardens. Their sweet-sour taste, intense aroma and versatility in the kitchen make them indispensable in any household.

title: Percheziții în Cluj, inclusiv la o autoritate publică, pentru delapidare
description: Polițiștii Serviciului de Investigare a Criminalității Economice Cluj, sub coordonarea Parchetului de pe lângă Judecătoria Gherla, fac șase percheziții, miercuri dimineața, într-un dosar în care se fac cercetări pentru delapidare, fals în înscrisuri oficiale și alte infracțiuni.
title_translated: Searches in Cluj, including a public authority, for misappropriation
description_translated: The police officers of the Cluj Economic Crime Investigation Service, under the coordination of the Prosecutor's Office attached to the Gherla District Court, do six searches, Wednesday morning, in a file in which there are investigations for misappropriation, false in official documents and other crimes.

title: Previziuni explozive pentru aprilie! De ce este 27 aprilie cea mai tensionată zi din 2025? Astrolog Sanda Ionescu: „Ne putem trezi brusc că...”
description: Previziuni explozive pentru aprilie!
title_translated: Explosive forecasts for April! Why is April 27 the most tense day in 2025? Astrologer Sanda Ionescu: "We can suddenly wake up ..."
description_translated: Explosive forecasts for April!

title: Gest halucinant al suveranistului vopsit. Victor Ponta vrea din răsputeri să fie Călin Georgescu - și-a schimbat culoarea părului
description: Victor Ponta încearcă din ce în ce mai mult să semene cu Călin Georgescu și fizic, așa că nu s-a mai vopsit. De altfel, candidatul la prezidențiale a încercat să pozeze în înlocuitorul lui Călin Georgescu în cursa prezidențială, sugerând chiar că l-ar face premier și i-a promis că îl scapă de dosarele penale.
title_translated: Hallucinating gesture of the painted sovereign. Victor Ponta wants to be back to be Călin Georgescu - changed his hair color
description_translated: Victor Ponta is trying more and more to resemble Călin Georgescu and physically, so he has not been painted. In fact, the presidential candidate tried to pose in Călin Georgescu's replacement in the presidential race, even suggesting that he would make him a prime minister and promised him to get rid of the criminal files.

title: Samsung ar putea renunţa la slotul S Pen pe un viitor Galaxy S Ultra
description: După ce am aflat că Samsung ar putea renunţa la una dintre camerele din spate pe un viitor Galaxy S Ultra, acum descoperim că va sacrifica încă o componentă. E vorba despre slotul pentru stylusul S Pen. Avem detalii mai jos
title_translated: Samsung could give up the S Pen slot on a future Galaxy S Ultra
description_translated: After learning that Samsung could give up one of the rear cameras on a future Galaxy S Ultra, now we discover that you will sacrifice another component. This is the slot for the stylus s pen. We have details below

title: Cabană vânătorească din Dropia, județul Constanța, mistuită de flăcări: „Păcat, nu a mai rămas nimic”
description: O cabană vânătorească din Dropia, comuna Tortoman, județul Constanța, a fost mistuită de flăcări în seara zilei de marți, 9 aprilie. Incendiul s-a produs înainte de miezul nopții, iar la fața locului s-au deplasat pompierii. Sursă video: Facebook/Observator Constanța Imagini cu cabana cuprinsă de flăcări au fost postate pe platforma socială Facebook, inclusiv de primarul [...]
title_translated: Hunting cabin in Dropia, Constanța county, consumed by flames: "Sin, nothing left"
description_translated: A hunting cottage in Dropia, Tortoman commune, Constanța county, was consumed by flames on Tuesday evening, April 9th. The fire occurred before midnight, and the firefighters moved to the scene. Video source: Facebook/Constanta Observer Images with the flames cabin were posted on the Facebook social platform, including the mayor [...]

title: Campaniile „DIGI donează viață” și „Avem același sânge” au fost premiate
description: Două campanii care au salvat vieți au fost premiate la gala companiilor sustenabile „Romanian Sustainability & CSR Awards”. „Digi donează viață” și „Avem același sânge”, derulate de Grupul DIGI, au adunat mii de donatori și au adus speranța pentru peste 21.000 de pacienți.

title: Alegeri prezidențiale 2025. Reguli privind finanțarea campaniei electorale - gestul pentru care toți candidații au INTERZIS
description: Campania electorală pentru alegerile prezidențiale din mai 2025 se desfășoară în intervalul 4 aprilie, ora 00:00 - 3 mai, ora 7:00. Potrivit regulilor de campanie, contribuțiile candidaților pentru campania electorală pot proveni exclusiv din venituri proprii ale acestora, donații primite de la persoane fizice (maximum 810.000 lei) sau împrumuturi de la persoane fizice sau contractate (maximum 2.025.000 lei). Valoarea maximă a contribuțiilor unui competitor electoral la prezidențiale nu poate depăși suma de 81.000.000 lei.
title_translated: Presidential elections 2025. Rules on the financing of the election campaign - the gesture for which all candidates forbade
description_translated: The election campaign for the presidential elections of May 2025 takes place between April 4, 00:00 - May 3, 7:00. According to the campaign rules, the contributions of the candidates for the election campaign can come exclusively from their own revenues, donations received from natural persons (maximum 810,000 lei) or loans from individuals or contracted (maximum 2,025,000 lei). The maximum value of the contributions of a presidential electoral competitor cannot exceed the amount of 81,000,000 lei.

title: Misterios monument de 27 de metri înălțime, văzut pe fundul oceanului: Cu o vechime de 12.000 de ani, ar rescrie istoria VIDEO
description: Un monument misterios a fost văzut pe fundul Oceanului Pacific, o structură ”piramidală” care măsoară 150 de metri lungime, 40 lățime și 27 înălțime, despre care se crede că are o vechime de 12.000 de ani. Monumentul Yonaguni se află lângă insulele Ryukyu din Japonia și ar putea rescrie istoria acestor locuri.
title_translated: Mysterious monument 27 meters high, seen on the bottom of the ocean: with a 12,000 -year -old, would rewrite video history
description_translated: A mysterious monument was seen on the bottom of the Pacific Ocean, a "pyramidal" structure measuring 150 meters long, 40 width and 27 height, which is believed to be 12,000 years old. The Yonaguni monument is near the Ryukyu Islands in Japan and could rewrite the history of these places.

title: Lege pentru toți românii care stau la curte. Ai nevoie de acordul vecinilor. Ce nu ai voie să faci
description: În România, regulile legate de construcții între vecini sunt stabilite prin Legea nr. 350/2001, privind amenajarea teritoriului și urbanismul, dar și prin Codul Civil. Aceste norme specifică distanțele minime între clădiri și alte condiții necesare pentru a preveni disputele între proprietari.
title_translated: Law for all Romanians who are in the court. You need the agreement of the neighbors. What are you not allowed to do
description_translated: In Romania, the rules related to constructions between neighbors are established by Law no. 350/2001, regarding the spatial planning and urbanism, but also by the Civil Code. These norms specify the minimum distances between buildings and other conditions necessary to prevent disputes between the owners.

title: Peste 200 de mașini de epocă pot fi văzute duminică, la Retroparada Primăverii din București
description: Filiala București a Retromobil Club România organizează duminică, 13 aprilie, în parcul Lumea Copiilor din sectorul 4, Retro Parada Primăverii 2025, expoziția care deschide calendarul evenimentelor organizate în acest an. Vor putea fi văzute aproximativ 200 de mașini de epocă fabricate între anii 1920 și 1990. Evenimente de acest tip au loc în 35 de orașe din România.
title_translated: Over 200 vintage cars can be seen on Sunday, at Retroparada Spring in Bucharest
description_translated: The Bucharest Branch of Retromobil Club Romania organizes on Sunday, April 13, in the Children's World Park in Sector 4, Retro Spring Parade 2025, the exhibition that opens the calendar of events organized this year. About 200 vintage cars will be seen between 1920 and 1990. Events of this type take place in 35 cities in Romania.

title: Aproape 1000 de piloți israelieni care au semnat o scrisoare pentru încetarea războiului din Gaza au fost concediați
description: Aproape 1.000 de rezervişti şi foşti rezervişti ai Forţelor Aeriene Israeliene au publicat o scrisoare semnată, sub forma unui anunţ, în diverse publicaţii, precum portalul Ynet, cerând eliberarea tuturor ostaticilor, chiar cu preţul încetării războiului din Fâşia Gaza, informează joi EFE, care menţionează că semnatarii scrisorii au fost concediaţi, transmite Agerpres.
title_translated: Almost 1000 Israeli pilots who signed a letter to cease the war in Gaza were fired
description_translated: Nearly 1,000 reservists and former reservists of the Israeli Air Force have published a signed letter, in the form of an announcement, in various publications, such as the Ynet portal, demanding the release of all hostages, even at the price of termination of the war in the Gaza strip, informs EFI, which mentions that the signators of the letter were dismissed.

title: Secretul folosit de gospodinele din Dobrogea pentru scrumbii delicioase. Cum să gătești ca un adevărat maestru
description: În inima Dobrogei, acolo unde tradițiile culinare se împletesc cu peisajele pitorești, gospodinele au descoperit de-a lungul timpului o serie de tehnici și secrete care transformă preparatele din pește în adevărate delicii. Scrumbia, cu gustul ei inconfundabil, devine vedeta meselor festive și nu numai, iar rețetele transmise din generație în generație sunt dovada unei îndelungate pasiuni pentru arta culinară. Dacă vrei să aduci un strop din magia acestei regiuni în bucătăria ta, e timpul să descoperi cum să gătești ca un adevărat maestru, pregătind scrumbii care să încânte toate simțurile.

description_translated: In the heart of Dobrogea, where the culinary traditions are interwoven with the picturesque landscapes, the housewives have discovered a series of techniques and secrets that transform the fish preparations into true delights. The ash, with its unmistakable taste, becomes the star of festive meals and not only, and the recipes transmitted from generation to generation are proof of a long passion for culinary art. If you want to bring a splash of the magic of this region in your kitchen, it's time to discover how to cook as a true master, preparing the ash to delight all the senses.

title: Șocul venit de la 11.000 de km, lovește America: Trump, surprins de izbitura primită
description: Un adevărat șoc, care a venit de la o distanță uriașă de peste 11.000 de kilometri, lovește America. Economiștii spun că declinul industriei manufacturiere din SUA din ultimele decenii nu a fost cauzat în principal de liberul schimb, ci de ritmul schimbării fără timp pentru adaptare. „Șocul Chinei” oferă o lecție, dar nu este cea pe care Trump a învățat-o, fiind surprins de amploarea ei, susțin analiștii.
title_translated: The shock coming from 11,000 km, hits America: Trump, surprised by the hit received
description_translated: A real shock, which came from a huge distance of over 11,000 kilometers, strikes America. Economists say that the decline of the US manufacturing industry in recent decades has not been caused mainly by free trade, but by the rate of time without time for adaptation. The "shock of China" offers a lesson, but it is not the one that Trump has learned, being surprised by its magnitude, the analysts say.

Măsura este menită să prevină răspândirea febrei aftoase (FMD) după o creștere a numărului de cazuri în Europa.
title_translated: Go to the UK? New prohibitions for tourists
description_translated: Starting on Saturday, tourists will no longer be able to bring in the UK beef, sheep, goat or pork or dairy products in EU countries, according to The Guardian. The measure is meant to prevent the spread of aphthous fever (FMD) after an increase in the number of cases in Europe.

title: Ciclism: Van der Poel câștigă a treia oară consecutiv clasica Paris – Roubaix
description: Ciclistul neerlandez Mathieu Van der Poel (Alpecin Deceuninck) a câștigat pentru al treilea an consecutiv cursa Paris – Roubaix, considerată cea mai dificilă dintre “Monumente” (principalele cinci curse clasice de o zi), El l-a învins net pe campionul mondial, slovenul Tadej Pogacar (UAE Team Emirates).
title_translated: Cycling: Van der Poel wins the third consecutive time of Paris - Roubaix consecutive time
description_translated: Neermian cyclist Mathieu Van Der Poel (Alpecin Deceuninck) won for the third consecutive year Paris-Roubaix, considered the most difficult of "monuments" (the main classic one-day races), he made the world champion, the Slovenian Tadej Pogacar (UAE Team Emirates).

title: 'Avionul în care ar fi trebuit să fiu a trecut pe deasupra mea': o întâmplare care ne face să privim eșecurile altfel
description: Nima Bank trebuia să fie în avionul care zboară deasupra noastră în această imagine. Din păcate, a visat cu ochii deschiși în aeroportul din Istanbul, savurând o cafea, și a pierdut noțiunea timpului. Citește mai departe...
title_translated: 'The plane where I should have been passed over me: an incident that makes us look at the failures differently
description_translated: Nima Bank had to be on the plane that flies over us in this image. Unfortunately, he dreamed with his eyes open at Istanbul airport, enjoying a coffee, and lost the notion of time. Read on ...

title: Din Suceava în Bucureşti. Cofetăria Lapterra din Suceava se extinde în Capitală, chiar aproape de Calea Victoriei, după o investiţie de 350.000 euro. În 2024, Lapterra a generat o cifră de afaceri de 3,5 mil. lei
description: Laboratorul de cofetărie Lapterra, un business pornit în 2019 de către tânăra antreprenoare Andreea Druţă în Suceava, se extinde în Bucureşti, aproape de Calea Victoriei. Investiţia pentru deschiderea cofetăriei în Capitală este de circa 350.000 de euro, din surse proprii şi din credit. Antrepre­noarea aşteaptă afaceri de 6 mil. lei în 2025, ceea ce înseamnă o creştere de 70% faţă de anul anterior.
title_translated: From Suceava to Bucharest. The Lapterra confectionery in Suceava extends to the Capital, even close to Calea Victoriei, after an investment of 350,000 euros. In 2024, Lapterra generated a turnover of 3.5 million lei
description_translated: The Lapterra confectionery laboratory, a business started in 2019 by the young entrepreneur Andreea Druţă in Suceava, extends to Bucharest, close to Calea Victoriei. The investment for opening the confectionery in the Capital is about 350,000 euros, from own sources and from credit. The entrepreneur is waiting for business of 6 million lei in 2025, which means an increase of 70% compared to the previous year.

title: Palma dată de unguri lui Viktor Orban. Aproape 60% din populația Ungariei susține o mare schimbare în UE
description: Aproape 60% din populația Ungariei este de acord cu aderarea Ucrainei la Uniunea Europeană, deși premierul Viktor Orban este unul dintre liderii UE care se opune cu vehemență demersului.
title_translated: The palm given by Hungarians to Viktor Orban. Nearly 60% of Hungary's population supports a big change in the EU
description_translated: Almost 60% of the population of Hungary agrees to the accession of Ukraine in the European Union, although Prime Minister Viktor Orban is one of the EU leaders who vehemently opposes the approach.

title: Ce salarii se câștigă în domeniul juridic. Cât câștigă un avocat, un procuror sau un judecător
description: Un jurist câștigă în medie 5.000 de lei pe lună, un avocat pleacă acasă cu 6.000 de lei, în vreme ce un procuror primește 10.000 de lei, iar un judecător 13.000 de lei, arată datele Salario, comparatorul de salarii realizat de eJobs. „Profesiile juridice oferă multiple oportunități de carieră, în funcție de specializare și experiență. [...]

description_translated: A lawyer earns an average of 5,000 lei per month, a lawyer leaves home with 6,000 lei, while a prosecutor receives 10,000 lei, and a judge 13,000 lei, Salario data, the salary comparator made by EJobs shows. "The legal professions offer multiple career opportunities, according to specialization and experience. [...]

title: Marea Britanie: Vaccin împotriva melanomului, disponibil pentru primii pacienți
description: MediafaxPacienții cu un tip avansat de melanom cutanat vor avea acces rapid la un nou vaccin „revoluționar” împotriva cancerului de care suferă. Tratamentul inovator este parte a unui studiu al Serviciului Național de Sănătate (NHS) din Regatul Unit.Articolul Marea Britanie: Vaccin împotriva melanomului, disponibil pentru primii pacienți apare prima dată în Mediafax.
title_translated: Great Britain: Melanoma vaccine available for first patients
description_translated: Mediafaxpients with an advanced type of skin melanoma will have quick access to a new "revolutionary" vaccine against the cancer. Innovative treatment is part of a study of the National Health Service (NHS) in the UK.

title: Calendarul vacanțelor de schi din februarie 2026, stabilit. În ce perioadă au elevii zile libere, în funcţie de judeţ
description: MediafaxInspectoratele școlare județene au stabilit prima vacanță a copiilor din anul 2026, a anunțat luni Ministerul Educației și Cercetării. Perioada diferă de la un județ la altul. Intervalul de timp alocat programelor „Școala altfel” și „Săptămâna verde” rămâne, de asemenea, la alegerea unităților de învățământ.Articolul Calendarul vacanțelor de schi din februarie 2026, stabilit. title: Fostul ministru Daniel Chițoiu, condamnat cu suspendare după ce a UCIS două persoane
description: La peste cinci ani de la un accident rutier soldat cu moartea a două persoane, fostul vicepremier și ministru de Finanțe, Daniel Chițoiu, a fost condamnat definitiv la trei ani de închisoare cu suspendare. Sentința a fost pronunțată pentru ucidere din culpă, însă fostul demnitar nu va ajunge în închisoare.
title_translated: Former minister Daniel Chițoiu, convicted with suspension after killing two people
description_translated: More than five years after a road accident resulting in the deaths of two persons, the former deputy prime minister and Minister of Finance, Daniel Chițoiu, was definitively sentenced to three years in prison. The sentence was pronounced for murder, but the former dignitary will not reach prison.

title: Tenis de masă: Elizabeta Samara, victorie categorică în fața americancei Amy Wang

Categical in front of the American Amy Wang first appears in Mediafax.

title: Discuţiile dintre ucraineni şi americani pe tema exploatării resurselor minerale sunt „constructive”
description: Negocierile dintre Ucraina şi Statele Unite privind un acord de exploatare a resurselor minerale strategice ale Ucrainei se desfăşoară în mod „constructiv”, a declarat luni pentru AFP un oficial familiarizat cu discuţiile.
title_translated: The discussions between Ukrainians and Americans on the exploitation of mineral resources are "constructive"
description_translated: Negotiations between Ukraine and the United States on an agreement to exploit Ukraine's strategic mineral resources are "constructively", an official familiar with discussions told AFP on Monday.

title: Sebastian Burduja: Se impune o actualizare a plafoanelor care stabilesc pragul de vulnerabilitate pentru consumatori
description: Un mecanism de sprijin pentru consumatorii vulnerabili va fi stabilit, pentru perioada de după 1 iulie, de către Ministerul Energiei împreună cu Ministerul Muncii, fiind necesară și o actualizare a plafoanelor care stabilesc pragul de vulnerabilitate pentru o lărgire a plajei de beneficiari, a declarat luni ministrul Energiei, Sebastian Burduja, la un eveniment de specialitate.
title_translated: Sebastian Burduja: An update of ceilings that set the vulnerability threshold for consumers is required
description_translated: A support mechanism for vulnerable consumers will be established, for the period after July 1, by the Ministry of Energy together with the Ministry of Labor, and an update of the ceilings establishing the vulnerability threshold for a widening of the Beneficiaries, said Energy Minister Sebastian Burduja, at a specialized event on Monday.

title: Combinarea a două medicamente ar putea preveni mii de atacuri de cord, AVC-uri și decese
description: Un nou studiu arată că mii de infarcte și accidente vasculare cerebrale ar putea fi prevenite prin administrarea combinată a două medicamente comune, în primele 12 săptămâni de la un atac de cord.
title_translated: The combination of two drugs could prevent thousands of heart attacks, strokes and deaths
description_translated: A new study shows that thousands of heart attacks and stroke could be prevented by combined two common drugs, within the first 12 weeks after a heart attack.

title: Victor Angelescu acuză, după CFR - Rapid: „Dacă nu te plângi, pari ciudat”
description: CFR Cluj - Rapid 1-1. Victor Angelescu, acționarul minoritar al giuleștenilor a intrat în direct la câteva minute după remiza din Gruia și a oferit prima reacție. Acesta nu s-a mulțumit cu punctul obținut, ținând cont de ocaziile mari pe care le-au ratat rapidiștii.Mai mult decât atât, Angelescu s-a luat și de arbitrajul lui Florin Andrei, cel care îl eliminase pe Mattias Kait în minutul 70 pentru o presupusă simulare. ...

More than that, Angelescu also took from Florin Andrei's arbitration, who had eliminated Mattias Kait in the 70th minute for an alleged simulation. ... ...

title: Obligațiile românilor care trăiesc în străinătate și dau în chirie locuințele din România. Ce impune ANAF
description: Pentru foarte mulți cetățeni români care trăiesc și muncesc în străinătate, apartamentele rămase în proprietate în România reprezintă o sursă de venit suplimentar, adesea obținută prin închiriere. Iar adesea societățile comerciale, acolo unde este posibil acest lucru, pot constitui pentru astfel de proprietari cei mai de încredere chiriași.
title_translated: The obligations of the Romanians living abroad and rent the houses in Romania. What imposes ANAF
description_translated: For many Romanian citizens who live and work abroad, the apartments remain in Romania represent an additional source of income, often obtained by rent. And often commercial companies, where this is possible, can be the most reliable tenants for such owners.

title: 'Primul de acest fel'. Descoperirea care conectează lumi antice: Artefactul muzical schimbă tot ce știam despre civilizație
description: Un set de cimbale din bronz, vechi de peste cinci milenii, descoperit în Oman, aruncă o nouă lumină asupra legăturilor culturale și migrațiilor din epoca bronzului. O relicvă muzicală rară care vorbește despre sunetele trecutului... și despre oamenii care le-au purtat cu ei. Citește mai departe...
title_translated: 'The first of this kind'. The discovery that connects ancient worlds: The musical artifact changes everything I knew about civilization
description_translated: A set of bronze thymes, over five millennia old, discovered in Oman, sheds a new light on cultural ties and migrations of the Bronze Age. A rare musical relic that talks about the sounds of the past ... and about the people who carried them with them. Read on ...

title: George Simion, în pole-position pentru turul 2 al prezidențialelor. Pericolul ascuns din spatele unei posibile victorii
description: Alegerile prezidențiale din România se apropie, iar toate sondajele — fie că vin din surse consacrate sau din laboratoare mai puțin transparente — conturează același scenariu surprinzător pentru o parte din electorat: George Simion, liderul Alianței pentru Unirea Românilor (AUR), este cotat cu șanse reale nu doar să acceadă în turul al doilea, ci chiar să o facă de pe primul loc.
title_translated: George Simion, in the pole-post for the 2nd tour of the presidents. The hidden danger behind a possible victory
description_translated: The presidential elections in Romania are approaching, and all the polls - whether they come from consecrated sources or less transparent laboratories - outline the same surprising scenario for part of the electorate: George Simion, the leader of the alliance for Romanians (gold), is rated with real chances not only to access the second round, but to do it.

title: Salariul mediu brut din România, mai mare ca în Japonia și Croația. Economist: „Dacă nu eram în UE și NATO, eram la nivelul Vietnamului”
description: Conform datelor analizate de către CEIC Data, o companie din Marea Britanie specializată în compararea de date economice pe glob, România depășește multe țări cu pretenții de pe glob în ceea ce privește salariul mediu brut.
title_translated: The average gross salary in Romania, higher than in Japan and Croatia. Economist: "If I wasn't in the EU and NATO, I was at the Vietnam level"
description_translated: According to the data analyzed by Ceic Data, a company from the UK specialized in comparing economic data around the globe, Romania exceeds many countries with claims around the world in terms of average gross salary.

title: Unde s-a „blocat" dosarul „Kasta Morrely". Acuzații de trafic de minori la adresa unui impresar, care și-ar fi făcut „harem" în Iași: „Încrederea în actul de justiție, afectată”
description: Kasta Morrely, „agenția" de manechine suspectată că ar fi, de fapt, „haremul” personal al ieșeanului Morel Bolea, din care ar face parte fete minore, traficate pentru prostituție, a revenit în atenția publicului larg, după asocierea imaginii cu Jean-Claude Van Damme. Ziare.com a obținut noi informații în acest caz.
title_translated: Where the "Kasta Morrely" file was "blocked". Prosecutions of trafficking of minors against an impresario, who would have made "harem" in Iasi: "trust in the act of justice, affected"
description_translated: Kasta Morrely, the "agency" of mannequins suspected of being, in fact, the personal "harem" of Iasi Morel Bolea, of which minor girls would be part of prostitution, returned to the attention of the general public, after associating the image with Jean-Claude Van Damme. Ziare.com has obtained new information in this case.

title: Vacanță pe litoralul Mării Negre din Bulgaria. Cele mai atractive stațiuni pentru români
description: Litoralul bulgăresc poate fi opțiune atractivă pentru turiștii români care caută vacanțe accesibile, peisaje spectaculoase, atracții istorice și naturale, dar și servicii de calitate. Stațiuni ca Nisipurile de Aur, Sunny Beach și Balcic sunt apreciate de români.
title_translated: Holiday on the Black Sea coast in Bulgaria. The most attractive resorts for Romanians
description_translated: The Bulgarian coast can be an attractive option for Romanian tourists looking for accessible holidays, spectacular landscapes, historical and natural attractions, but also quality services. Stations like golden sands, Sunny Beach and Balchik are appreciated by Romanians.

title: Cum a preluat o țară controlul militar în Pacific: SUA au rămas pe margine VIDEO
description: În urmă cu două decenii, o țară a conceput o rețea strategică mondială, un plan global care are în mod intenționat o ”utilizare dublă”, atât civilă, cât și militară. De atunci, această superputere a reușit să câștige în liniște controlul militar asupra Pacificului. China și-a extins raza militară de-a lungul Oceanului Pacific, construind zeci de porturi, aeroporturi și proiecte de comunicații în puncte cheie dintr-o regiune vastă care ar putea exclude Statele ...
title_translated: How did a country take over the Pacific military control: US remained on the edge of video
description_translated: Two decades ago, a country conceived a world strategic network, a global plan that intentionally has a "double use", both civil and military. Since then, this superpower has managed to quietly gain military control over the Pacific. China has expanded its military ray along the Pacific Ocean, building dozens of ports, airports and communications projects at key points in a vast region that could exclude states ...

title: Ce program au supermarketurile de Paște
description: Supermarketurile au anunțat programul de funcționare pentru sărbătorile pascale din 2025, inclusiv zilele în care magazinele vor fi închise, pentru a oferi și angajaților posibilitatea de a petrece în familie.

description: Pe 16 aprilie, Biserica Ortodoxă prăznuieşte Sfintele Muceniţe Agapi, Hionia şi Irina, surori după trup şi suflet, cunoscute pentru credinţa lor statornică în Hristos şi pentru jertfa adusă în numele adevărului.
